126a7(mdo sde): bsngal gyi tshor ba yang rgyun rkang ngo // sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la 'dod chags kyis gnod par ma gyur cing / zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin nyon mongs pa gzhan gyis
126a8(mdo sde): kyang gnod par ma gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang pa ma lta bu'i 'du shesu gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus
126b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de las tshigasu bcad pa 'di bu'o// gang gis brtson 'grus stobs ni mtha' yas yangs pa brtan pa brtsams gyur te// gang gis brtson 'grus chen po stobs kyis bskal pa dag
126b2(mdo sde): las phyir phyogs spangs// gang gis yon tan dag ni phyogs bcu rnams na mthu ldan rab brjod pa// shAkya thub pa'i 'od yangs 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa mdzes// gang chos rgya chen bla med mnyan
126b3(mdo sde): slad de yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// mkhas pa blo gros brtan pa dag ni bskal pa grangs med rtag tu nyan// blo rgyas gang zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa tshim skyed pa// thub pa de ni gang
126b4(mdo sde): phyir sems can bde bar bzhed pas 'di dag phyung // mnga' bang dag gang zhig brtson 'grus kyis ni bdud stobs mu stegs cho/ gas bcas pa ma mdzad nas// pad ma byung ba bzhin du 'phags
126b5(mdo sde): shing phyogs bcu dag tu lhun po ji bzhin mdzes// gang zhig nyi ma bzhin du sku'i 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang mdzad pa/ de yi chos kyi 'khor lo bzhag pa don chen gsan du rgyas pa
126b6(mdo sde): gshegasu gsol// rab tu bskor bar ma gyur mtshungs pa med cing rgyal ba kun gyis bskor gyur pa// 'khor lo dam pa stobs bcu sems can thugs brtse phyir ni de ring bskor ba mdzad// srog
126b7(mdo sde): chags rnams kyis bsten pa rnyed dka' legs pa rgya chen de ring 'byung bar 'gyur// gang dag dad pa dang ba che yangs don du gnyer ba de dag de ring ltos// de nas 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
126b8(mdo sde): thams cad tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis go bar byas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yo bar byas/ sems can thams cad
127a1(mdo sde): bde bar byas/ nyon mongs pa'i khams thams cad rnam par sbyangs/ mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal/ bdud kyi khyim thams cad mog mogo por byas nas/ 
127a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du slar 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to// de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs
127a3(mdo sde): pa dri med rnam dag rin chen 'od// byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i chos rgyun mi 'chad pa'o zer bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i bsod
127a4(mdo sde): nams bkod pas/ rgya che ba dang ldan pa na byang chub sems dpa' da me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur da pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems
127a5(mdo sde): dpa' gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi
127a6(mdo sde): khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan khri skor ba bya
127a7(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ lha'i nor bu be DUn+da'i dra ba'i char rab tu phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das
127a8(mdo sde): / rab tu mtshungs med yon tan pha rol byin// khyod kyi yon tan sngags 'phreng phyogs bcu kun na brjod// khyod kyi yon tan tshogs mchis zhing gang yon tan gter// der ni chos ston gnyer ba bdag cag
127b1(mdo sde): rab tu mchis chos dbyings mnyam nyid rnam rtog ma mchis ji bzhin du// bcom ldan dri med 'od kyis mnyam pa nyid mkhyen kyang // shin tu bslabs pa'i sgyu ma mkhan ltar chos kyi rgya la// sems
127b2(mdo sde): can rnam par dgrol slad tha dad bstan par mdzad// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ shar
127b3(mdo sde): phyogs logasu gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen spobs pa'i
127b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya ba'o// da nges bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i
127b5(mdo sde): klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan ci ga tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi
127b6(mdo sde): mjed 'dir byin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan khri
127b7(mdo sde): skor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / gser gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon
127b8(mdo sde): par bstod do// bcom ldan thugs rje'i sprin gyis 'jig rten rgyas bkang nas// 'od kyi glo phyung stong pa bdag med sgra bsgrags te// yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i lam gyi chu yis zhi mdzad cing // dkar
128a1(mdo sde): po'i stobs dbang nags tshal gel ba 'phel bar mdzad// bde gshegs shes rab 'od kyis gti mug mun bsal nas// ring nas srid mchor gnyid log sems
128a2(mdo sde): can sad mdzad de// lam yang bstan cing sred pa dag kyang skams par mdzad// thar pa'i grong gnas rnams kyi mig kyang rnam par spyod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems
128a3(mdo sde): dpa'i stong pa tshad med pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas// lho phyogs log su gnas te// rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod
128a4(mdo sde): do/ de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas snang ba 'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang lnga dran pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sgra bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi/ 
128a5(mdo sde): rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gi'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor/ cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi
128a6(mdo sde): snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkad par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bco
128a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / nor bu mu tig gi do shal gyi 'phreng ba'i dra
128a8(mdo sde): bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// khyod kyi sku'i 'phrin las na mkha'i khams 'dra zhing // smon lam dge bas
128b1(mdo sde): dag pa bye ba brag mang ldan// dri ming rnam par dag cing zag pa med pa des// grogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab gsal// khyod kyi tshig ni rgyun chags gsal zhing mtshungs pa
128b2(mdo sde): ste/ 'gro ba bsam dag bsam pa mnyam nyid yongs tshi ma bgyid// sems kyi rgyu dang rnam rtog gang yang mi mnga' yang // sems can bsam pa rnams la rgyal ba dag gi 'byung // de nas
128b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gi bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ nub phyogs logasu gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi
128b4(mdo sde): stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi
128b5(mdo sde): khams rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo mchog rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma
128b6(mdo sde): snyed kyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor
128b7(mdo sde): gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ nges bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas
128b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / nor bu'i do shal dang / rin po che'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
129a1(mdo sde): mngon par bstod ngo // 'dzam bu chu gser bcom lta bur ser ba'i sku// kun nas spyan mnga' phyogs bcu dag tu rnam par mdzes// mtshungs med sku la sems can gang dag
129a2(mdo sde): nges rtogs pa// de dag skyon med bde zhing dga' ba thob par 'gyur// gang gis lhun po brtsegs pa'i lta ba'i khrun tsam du// 'jig rten mkhyen pa mtshungs med rgyal ba ltas kyang ni// de
129a3(mdo sde): yis rdzu 'phrul kun gyi stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis// rnam par sprul pas rgyal ba'i spyi gtsug mthong mi nus// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad
129a4(mdo sde): med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas// byang phyogs log su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phru dal gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi bstan dag la 'khod do// 
129a5(mdo sde): de nas shar dang lce'i mtshams phyogs na/ de bzhin gshe/ gas pa mya ngan thams cad bcom pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhe nga 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'
129a6(mdo sde): kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur
129a7(mdo sde): nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khas mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi
129a8(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / rin po che dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab
129b1(mdo sde): stetshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// spu yis mtha' dpung ma mchis pa yi zhing 'dzin kyang // sems can rnams la mi gnod zhing la mi gnod pas/ 
129b2(mdo sde): mig med rnams kyis rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'tshal bar dka'// sangs rgyas sras ni rgyal ba'i byin gyis yang dag 'tshal// zhing cig phyogs bzhing mang rab 'byam ston mdzad de// kun tu bstan
129b3(mdo sde): kyang rnam par 'phel dang 'grib ma mchis// bsam pa chen po dag ldan ci 'drar gyur de la// dpag med rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pas de ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub
129b4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa de dag gis bcom ldanadangs la mngon par bstod nas/ shar dang lho'i phyogs 'tshams log su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis
129b5(mdo sde): sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khong ngo // de nas lha dang nu ba kyi mtshams phyogs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ thugs rje chen pos sems can thams cad la gzigs pa'i
129b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mig bzang po na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye
129b7(mdo sde): snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du dang te lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yung tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'dir phyin te/ 'dra
129b8(mdo sde): khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lam khri bskor ba byas nas/ @
130a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / na bza'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// 
130a2(mdo sde): sems can dam pa g.yag rnga thogs pa ji bzhin du// tshul khrims dri med nor bu rin chen 'dra ba srung // tshul khrims med gzigs mgon po shin tu thugs rje zhing // bdag la bstod pa mi mdzad
130a3(mdo sde): gzhan la smod mi mdzad// lhun po ji bzhin khyod bstan bla ma rgya chen ston// chu gter zab mo bzhin du shin tu gting dpag dka'// srid pa dog par bcings pa kun nas grol ba ste// sems can
130a4(mdo sde): khrag khrig nyes pa chen pos bcings las grol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems da dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon
130a5(mdo sde): par bstod nas/ lho dang nub kyi mtshams phyogs log su ga nas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa/ 'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas nub dang byang gi
130a6(mdo sde): mtshams phyogs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mun pa dang bral ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can zhes bya ba 'od des
130a7(mdo sde): bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang
130a8(mdo sde): cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mi mjed 'dir byin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
130b1(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rgyan gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su
130b2(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// srid pa'i rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rtogs mdzad nas// byed pa sgyu ma lta bu dngos po med par ston// sgyu ma lta bu'i sems can
130b3(mdo sde): khams ni 'dul mdzad kyang // 'di na sems can rang bzhin ma mchis mkhas ma mchis// dper na mi zhig gnyis kyis log pa'i rmi lam na// gzugs mthong yang dag 'du shes de bzhin
130b4(mdo sde): mthong ma lags// 'dus byas dngos po ma mchis rmi lam la dadra bar gsungs// chos rnams snang yang 'di na chos la chags ma mchis// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
130b5(mdo sde): de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag ni sa bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ nub dang byang gi mtshams phyogs log su gnas te/ 
130b6(mdo sde): rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas byang dang shar gyi mtshams phyogs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa rnam par sems
130b7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yongasu dag pa dri ma med par rab tu gnas pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha' yas dri ma med ces bya ba 'od nges bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub
130b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams
131a1(mdo sde): mi mjed 'dir byin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tsha
131a2(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / rtag tu sgra 'byung ba'i sil snyan gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ 
131a3(mdo sde): tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// zab mo'i chos la mkhas shing rab tu zhil mos// khyod kyis chos kun stong zhing mtshan ma med par mkhyen// khyod
131a4(mdo sde): thugs kyi dgongs pa 'jig rten kun ma 'tshal// mtha' yas blo mnga' sems kyis bsam pa cho ga mkhyen// sems can gcig gi spyod bzhin sems can kun gyi spyod// gang
131a5(mdo sde): ngag dus gsum ldan pa de dag khyod kyis mkhyen// sems can 'du shes mi 'jug sems kyis 'du shes min// 'du shes yongs shes mkhas shing mnyam pa nyid dang ldan
131a6(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ byang dang sher gyi phyogs mtshams logasu gnas ste/ 
131a7(mdo sde): rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod // de nas 'og gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ud pa la dmar po'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi kha
131a8(mdo sde): rnam par sdong byeng du byung ban/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'di ngas bskul mthag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gi'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yong su pathar
131b1(mdo sde): bdun du 'angar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par
131b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa
131b3(mdo sde): byed cing nor bu rin po che'i gling gi phreng gi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// gal te khrag
131b4(mdo sde): / khrig zhing na ji snyed rdul mchis pa// de snyed bde gshegs sras po rgyal ba'i drung lhags te// bskal pa bye ba stong / mang zhu ba zhus pa dag/ de dag thams cad tshig gcig
131b5(mdo sde): dus kyis ko bar mdzad/ blo la mkhas pa rab rdzogs shes rab shin tu rdzogs// gzungs dang ting 'dzin rab rdzogs bsod nams mtha' yas te// bskal pa mang po/ 
131b6(mdo sde): mtha' yas bsngags pa rab brjod kyang // skra rtses rgya mtsho ji bzhin zad par mi nus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis// 
131b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas// 'og gi phyogs log su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas steng gi phyogs na de bzhin
131b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa sgra bsgrags mchog gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyis brgyan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
132a1(mdo sde): 'od nges bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur
132a2(mdo sde): nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom
132a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / rgyan thams cad bkod pa
132a4(mdo sde): dang rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas bcom ldanan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// 
132a5(mdo sde): bde gshegs sku'i 'drin las mtha' dang dpung ma mchis/ bla med rnams kyi gsung thugs spyod yul mtha' yas pa// de ni sangs rgyas mkhyen gyi sems can gzhan gyis
132a6(mdo sde): min dper na na mkha'i mtha' ma skye bos mi rnyed bzhin// mtshungs med spyod pa mtha' dpung med pa ji bzhin du// byang chub 'khor lo de bzhin 'on te mya ngan 'das// sa bon ji bzhin de ltar
132a7(mdo sde): 'bras bu 'byung ba ltar// de bzhin phyogs bcur rgyal ba'i gnas kyang tshad ma mchis// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis
132a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ steng gi bar snang la dong ste/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de ltar phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub
132b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' bcu 'dus pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag 'od des bskul ma thag tu skad cig thang cig yung tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi
132b2(mdo sde): khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra
132b3(mdo sde): mdzad nas/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nag ga / 
132b4(mdo sde): dang zhing snod du gyur pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung
132b5(mdo sde): bsal ba'i sgra thos nas/ lus dang sems tshim bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus ji ltar byung ba'ithem skas dag nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la
132b6(mdo sde): 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par byin te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zha las napo phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu ji ltar 'thun pa'i stan dag la 'khod do// gsung
132b7(mdo sde): bsal sgra de nyid kyis tshangs pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chen dang / 'od chung dang /

133a1(mdo sde): /  / mig /  nga/  thong nga/ chos mi kyi mas pa / 
133a2(mdo sde): cig thang cig lung car del 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkang bar phyin te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'angs la mag zas phyag 'tshal nas/ sman rab tu bstan pa dag la 'khod / 
133a3(mdo sde): des bcom ldan 'das kyis ma khol dus bachen po mkhyen nas/ sprin mtshams kyi 'jod sde nas byang chub sems dpa'i skabs nye bar ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'ad khyer byung ste/ 
133a4(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs so/ da lan bdun bskor ba bus nas/ byang chub sems dnganga'i tshogs de nyid kyi spyi bor mi snang bar gyur to// de nas
133a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos tham/ sa cad la dbang sgrub 'od des reg ma thag tu/ de'i sangs rgyas kyis mthus byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin
133a6(mdo sde): rgyan thams cad bkong ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhug so// byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying pos chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin rgyan thams
133a7(mdo sde): ga ba la rnams pa tsugs ma thag N+Da/ denas ngo'i tshil khor gyi khyams rin po che bkong pa'i dngas na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdon seng ge 'i dri'ang du shing dal bye ga za
133a8(mdo sde): tshig rgyang drag rgya su ma du so'o// na thamams cad kyis smras pa// pa khyed rgyan thams ca las byas pa/ ram pa bathams cad cingang/ mags
133b1(mdo sde): ma sna tshogs thams cad bkram pa/ bla re yid du 'ong ba thams cad bres pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ 'khor thams cad kyi mig gis bltas pa/ 
133b2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa/ bsam pa tshim par byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang
133b3(mdo sde): sgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri chen po bskal par bsngags pa mtha' yas shes bya ba mngon par sprul nas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du tinge 'dzin de las langs
133b4(mdo sde): gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par thal ngamo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad degasol pa// nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'gro ba'i dgos pa rab tu bgyid
133b5(mdo sde): lha dbang gzi brjid yon tan sum cu rtsa gsum dga'// / tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten rnam par/ mdzes// sangs rgyas mthu yi yul gyis rnam par 'phrul
133b6(mdo sde): ba 'dir chos rnams mi g.yo na mkha'i rang bzhin ya maR+Ya// sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bu chu yi zla 'dra zhing // rje med byed pa po dang tshor ba po med par// mkhyen nas mgon po 'dir ni rnam par bsgrub pa
133b7(mdo sde): ston/ dkod pa sems kyi dbang 'gro rnams ni gzugs can min// rnam bsgrub thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin dbang du 'gro// bkod pa thams cad 'dir ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'dra// rnam bsgrub bdag gi ma mchis
133b8(mdo sde): gang na'ang gnas ma mchis// gang gis sems rgyun ma mchis rang bzhin dag 'tshal ba// de la blo bur gnas pa'i nyon mongs ma mchiso// rtog dang kun rtog yongasu rtog las sems grol ba// de ni sgyu ma'i rnam par sprul pa
134a1(mdo sde): sna tshogs ston// sa stengs rdul tsam mngon par 'phags pa ma mchis kyang // sa steng nor bu rin chen sna tshogs kun tu ston// gdan gang bzhugs nas sems can bye ba 'dul
134a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba// khyod kyis seng ge'i khri gdan rab mdzes bdag gis bgyis// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan mchog dang dar gyi 'phreng ba bsgreng // de ni gang du'ang 'gro ba ma mchis 'od ma mchis// 
134a3(mdo sde): khyod kyis gang nas chos rnams 'dul ba mkhyen nas kyang // sems can dam pa rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs ston// tshas pa'i dbyangs ltar legs shing shin tu bsrung ba'i gsung // 'jig rten
134a4(mdo sde): sgron ma mdzad pa bsod nams gzi brjid mang // bdag la thugs brtse'i slad du mdzegs ste gdan la bzhugs// rga dang 'chi dang na ba gcod pa'i chos bshang gsol// 
134a5(mdo sde): khyod la bsnyen bkur bgyi dang chos ni mnyan slad du// rnam dag sems can 'di rnams phyogs bcu dag nas lhags// gang gi don du lhags pa'i don de stsal du
134a6(mdo sde): gsol/ seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te chos kyang bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i lhag pa'i
134a7(mdo sde): bsam pa mkhyen nas// gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa brnyes nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba'i
134a8(mdo sde): sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa yongasu sgrub pa
134b1(mdo sde): dang / ye shes kyi 'byung gnas chos thams cad dbang sgyur ba'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa la rnam par gtan la bab pa la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa mngon par shes pa
134b2(mdo sde): chen po'i ye shes la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo mi skye ba'i chos ston pa/ theg pa thams cad theg pa gcig tu mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par 'du ba// chos
134b3(mdo sde): kyi dbyings tshul gcig cing ma 'dres pa la 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po la 'jug pa ston pa snying po dang ldan pa/ chos rnam par gdon mi za ba/ bdud kyi dkyil
134b4(mdo sde): 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jom par byed pa/ tshul bzhi dan gyi chos kyi tshul la gzhol bar 'jug pa/ nyon mongs nga pa dang lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dul ba/ chags pa med
134b5(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes kyi rjesu 'jug pa/ thug pa med par yongs su/ bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i thabs dang / ye shes ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug
134b6(mdo sde): par chags pa med pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi sgor 'jug pa/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par nges pa ston pa/ rtog pa med pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ mnyam pa nyid du 'jug
134b7(mdo sde): pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo mnyam pa nyid rtog par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs mnyam
134b8(mdo sde): pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / shes rab zad mi shes pa mngon par sgrub pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir/ 'phags
135a1(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa'i tshul la 'jug pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems rab tu dben par shes pa/ theg pa chen
135a2(mdo sde): pos 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sar dbang bskur ba rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad brjod pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i
135a3(mdo sde): tshul la 'jug pa 'di lta bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu bstan pa dang / bsnyad pa dang / bshad pa dang / klag pa dang / gsung ba dang / rnam par shes par bya ba dang
135a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyi bsam pa yo dngasu bskang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par smra dal pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor gyi the tsom thang
135a5(mdo sde): gcad pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar/ gcad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'abarda/ bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa chen po yongasu thob/ 
135a6(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so// / bam po gnyis pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang
135a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya bas sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par
135a8(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sgra bsgrags stobs kyi rgyal pos pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan/ 
135b1(mdo sde): nga'i 'khor gyi lag pa rnamasu me tog gi lnga ldi dag dang / me tog gi skon bu rnams byin gyis brlabs te/ me tog gi lnga ldi dang / me tog gi skon bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub
135b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la mngon par 'thor ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos dri bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 
135b3(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi spu'i khung bu thams cad du tsan dan sbrul gyis snying po'i dri byin gyis brlab so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can gyi
135b4(mdo sde): 'od bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug/ das nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la lus kyi 'od mtha' yas pa byin gyis brlob so// de nas sangs rgyas
135b5(mdo sde): kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems pas mig mi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
135b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs shing mig mi 'dzums par byin gyis brlab so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha' yas dri med kyis chos la mchog tu dga'
135b7(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chos don du gnyer zhing chos la dga' ba dang / mos par byin gyis brlab so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi
135b8(mdo sde): mthus byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pas rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel bar
136a1(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos brjed pa med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ring 'dzin
136a2(mdo sde): la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor byang chub kyi sems dran zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa mi brjed par byin gyis brlab so// de nas de'i tshe
136a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bdud dang phyir
136a4(mdo sde): rgol ba bcom par byin gyis brlab so// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' bdud ra rab tu 'joms pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par
136a5(mdo sde): 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa'i ting 'dzin de la
136a6(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud bye ba phrag brgya ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ 
136a7(mdo sde): myur ba myur bar ringasu rang gi bdud kyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
136a8(mdo sde): bas phyag 'tshal te/ lha'i mchod pa rnam pa brgya stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas/ gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la ga
136b1(mdo sde): ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol pa 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das chos bshad du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa chos bshad du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' bdu rab tu
136b2(mdo sde): 'joms pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis bdag cag bdud kyi sug las 'dor zhing slan chad sems can rnams la mig gis mi rtsol bar 'gyur ba'i las mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la dbugs/ 
136b3(mdo sde): dbyung ba stsol cig dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du mchis te/ bdag cag chos mnyan par bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud de dag dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka'
136b4(mdo sde): stsal to// grogs po dag leg so leg so// gang gi phyird khyed bdud kyi las kyang 'or la de bzhin gshegs pa la chos bshad par gsol ba yang thob shig dang de nyid
136b5(mdo sde): khyed kyi bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'da' ba'i rgyur 'gyu ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rgyub bskrun pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro// grogs
136b6(mdo sde): po dag 'di lta ste dper na/ mun pa mun nag la du mar bsags pa ni mar me gcig gis med par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i mun pa mun nag bskal pa brgyar bsags pa
136b7(mdo sde): yang ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis med par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang / nor bu
136b8(mdo sde): rin po che chen po gcig gis mun pa mun nag thams cad sel to// grogs po dag de bzhin du dge ba'i sems lhag mthong dang ldan pa gcig gis mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad sel to// 
137a1(mdo sde): grogs po dag de'i phyir khyed dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rim gyis mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal nas/ chos kyi snang ba chen po thob par 'gyuraro// de nas byang
137a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul de
137a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / kun tu bstan pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab// deng ni de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba'i sgrib pa
137a4(mdo sde): med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grang das bshad pa zhed par the tsom ma mchiso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das e ma byang chub sems
137a5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyis 'dus pa 'di ni che ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos
137a6(mdo sde): rnam par rol pa/ phyogs bcur sgra bsgrags pa/ sems shin tu byang bar bgyis te/ dri ma ma mchis pa rig pa dang / rnam par grol bas snang bar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad
137a7(mdo sde): kyis bstod cing bsngags pa/ chos thams cad la dbang phyug gis dbang sgyur ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa/ thabs la mkhas pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa/ 
137a8(mdo sde): bdud kyi las dang / rtsod pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba/ pas kyi rgol ba dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'dul ba/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa/ 
137b1(mdo sde): shes pa la ma ngas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ dran pa dang blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / mos pa dang / gzungs dang / 
137b2(mdo sde): ye shes rab tu thob pa/ byin gyi brlabs thogs pa ma mchis shing spobs pa rgyun mi 'chang ba/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa
137b3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa/ 'khrul pa ma mchis par na ma tho ba ma mchis pa'i chos ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang skang la mkhas pa/ 
137b4(mdo sde): 'am ci dang / byaka la bing ka dang / khrung khrung gi sgra dang / tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs can shin tu bshes gnyen bgyis pas/ sems can thams cad yongs mya ngan
137b5(mdo sde): las 'das pa la 'god pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snyi rje chen po'i lhag po'i bsam pa can brtan zhing shin tu gnas la/ mi g.yo zhing ji skad smra ba de bzhin du bgyid pa/ 
137b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par sbreng bar bgyid pa/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi chags pa'i 'khor yug lta bu smon pa ma mchis pa'i smon lam dang lnga pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo balnga dka' zhing
137b7(mdo sde): rtogs par dka' ba la zhugs pa/ chad pa dang rtag par mtha' gnyis ga dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad pa/ tshogs can chen po'i
137b8(mdo sde): tshogs kyi rgyal po yongasu 'gug pa/ ded dpon chen po bskal pa grangs med par chos dkon mchog gis bsod nams yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
138a1(mdo sde): pa gzugs can ma lags pa'i nang gso bar bgyid pa/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ snrel zhi'i rgyud dang / spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang
138a2(mdo sde): la mi skrag pa/ mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa/ gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin bgyid pa/ thams cad la sems dpa' ba bdud bzhi dang nyon mongs pa'i yul 'dul ba
138a3(mdo sde): mnyan pa lta bur gyur pa/ dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa shin tu yongs su sbyang ba
138a4(mdo sde): bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol ba la brtson pa da ri lta bur gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa/ da dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa/ 
138a5(mdo sde): dang / smad pa dang / bstod pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal las log pa/ dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i chos la sems zhugs pa/ 
138a6(mdo sde): chos dkon mchog gi 'od zer dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyis ngoms nas ngoms par bgyid pa/ pad ma lta bu 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa dang / 'od kyi kyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ 
138a7(mdo sde): zla ba dang nyi ma dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i 'od mog mog por bgyid pa/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ chos dkon mchog thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/ dkon mchog
138a8(mdo sde): gsum gyi gdung mi gcod pa/ sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bgyi ba dang / 'dul ba'i go cha 'tshal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dkon mchog thams cad kyi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ bsngags
138b1(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas pa dang yang dag par ldan pa/ bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa bsags pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i
138b2(mdo sde): mu'i bskal par bsngags pa mthar mi phyin pa 'di lta bu rnams kyi 'dus pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa nges par/ 
138b3(mdo sde): 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad bzhed pa snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni phan 'dogs par gyur pa
138b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dgapar bskyed pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems
138b5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba/ spyod pa la zhug/ sa pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul gcig la'/ jug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
138b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos la dbang bskur ba skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba/ nges pa'i sems can rnams la rkyen nye bar sgrub pa/ ma nges pa'i
138b7(mdo sde): sems can rnams la snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams la 'dzud pa/ theg pa gsum la mos pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par dgad pa ston pa ste/ 
138b8(mdo sde): ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na/ ngo
139a1(mdo sde): mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis 'khor gyi khyams 'dir sems
139a2(mdo sde): bskyed pa gcig gis bkod pa gang byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa brgya drag stong du yang ston pa'i rngo mi thog go// bcom ldan
139a3(mdo sde): 'das de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid de/ e ma ji tsam du gang rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong yang nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
139a4(mdo sde): theg pa la re ba bskyed pa'i sems can shes rab 'tshal/ pa can de dag ni ngo mtshar che ba snyam bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
139a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis nyan thos dang rang sang sa rgyas thams cad zil gyis non pa'i slad do// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shes
139a6(mdo sde): rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can gyi mi la la zhig nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya bor nas nor bu 'ching bu la dmigs pa snyam du sems pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang dag theg pa chen po
139a7(mdo sde): bor nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa la dmigs par bgyi ba snyam du sems pa'i sems can dag ni 'dra ba nyid du bdag la ganga'o// bcom ldan 'das rig
139a8(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa dang / skyed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyi ring po mi// 
139b1(mdo sde): thogs par chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'khor nga las
139b2(mdo sde): srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag sum nus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'dus pa'i
139b3(mdo sde): le'u'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po de gzigs nas/ e ma byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa
139b4(mdo sde): 'di dag ni chos don du gnyer ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par
139b5(mdo sde): 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu bshad pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pas spobs pa zhe sa bya ba'i 'od zer skyes bu chen po'i mtshan spyi gtsug
139b6(mdo sde): nas phyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer de drung ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang
139b7(mdo sde): drug gi rgyal po'i lus la lan brgyar bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i spyi gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to// 'od des byang chub sems dpa' gzus kyi dbang
139b8(mdo sde): drug gi rgyal po la reg ma thag tud nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ byang chub sems dpa' gzus kyibang phyug gi rgyal pos thams cadang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dnga'i tshogs kyi 'ang dang / seng ge'i dri dang / 
140a1(mdo sde): lus brgya 'gyur du zil gyis mnan nas/ lam me ljang de ldan ne'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang drug gi rgyal pos/ de bzhin
140a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs rig nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
140a3(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yu ba ni bai DUR+Ya/ g.yogs ma ni
140a4(mdo sde): gser snying po ni rin po che ne tso 'am ci rtsib das ni and rnyil las byas pa/ mu tig gi do sha la ra rab tu sbyangs pa/ dar gyi lnga ldis mdzes par byas pa/ 
140a5(mdo sde): dril bu g.ye kha'i dra ba 'khrol ba/ byang chub sems dang 'i lus kyi gzung ba/ rgyar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam zhig byin gyis brlab so// 
140a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rin po che'i gdugs de lta bu byin gyis brlabs nas me tog gi char yang phab ste/ sil snyan dang / sgra dbyangs rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
140a7(mdo sde): sgra 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// kun tu snang ba kun nas 'od zer can// don rnams ma lus ston pa kun nas
140a8(mdo sde): spyan/ rang byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas// / bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan kun dang ldan// skyes bu khyu mchog gis ni 'od zer phyung // zhal yal rnam par sbyong zhing 'od mdzad pa/ 
140b1(mdo sde): 'dren pa des ni bdag gi lus la yang // lan brgyar bskor ba bgyis nas spyi bor zhi// mi'i 'dren pa'i 'od kyi reg pas na// gang dag bdag gis sngon thob dran pa dang // blo gros spobs pa snang ba de
140b2(mdo sde): bzhin gzungs// rnam pa stong du khyad par 'phags par gyur// bdag lus rab sim sems ni rnam par dag/ bdag gi blo gros dga' mgu mnyam par gyur// gzhan yang sangs rgyas
140b3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa mtha' yas dang // spobs pa bdag gi lus la rab tu zhugs// sangs rgyas mthu chen bsnyen par dka' ba la// nyams chung dag gis mnyes par bgyid mi nus// sangs rgyas
140b4(mdo sde): gnang nas 'gro kun ngan slad du// sangs rgyas la ni zhu ba zhu bar 'tshal// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i skyo dad 'jug dang // 'jig rten rnam 'dren dag gis 'byung ba dang // 
140b5(mdo sde): snang dang nges 'byung rnam par sprul pa dang // dbang bskur ye na sa yongasu zhu bar 'tshal// theg mchog dam pa rtogs par khong chud cing // mtha' yas rgya che ba'i khor lhags
140b6(mdo sde): dang gang dag rgya chen chos don gnyer ba dag/ de dag pan slad sangs rgyas la yang zhu// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu tshar bcad cing // sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di ni shin tu bzung / 
140b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan phung po ma mchis dam chos mdzod// lus can rnams la bshad pa'i dus 'di lags// skyes bu khyu mchog mkhyen pa mtha' yas pas// bcom ldan de la bdag gi blo ma
140b8(mdo sde): chud/ bde gshegs mkhyen pa shes pas mi dpogs pas// mkhas pa yangs pa bdag ni zhu bar 'tshal// ji ltar bcom ldan khyod kyi mkhyen 'jug dang // ji ltar yun ring nas ni bslab/ 
141a1(mdo sde): pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po rab bslabs pa// 'dren pa rnams kyi spyod yul bshad gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal
141a2(mdo sde): pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni bsam
141a3(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ni tshad ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa ni yongs su mi skyo bar chos ston pa lags par rig cing de bzhin
141a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i thugs/ rdorje chen po la gnas par mthong nas don 'di zhu bar 'tshalo// / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan
141a5(mdo sde): dag ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rgyan gang dag gis brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na mdzes pa lags/ bcom ldan
141a6(mdo sde): 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob nas/ gti mug gi mun pa dang bral zhing the tsom ma mchis pa dang / chos kyi sgo chen po shin tu yongs su sbyangs
141a7(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i snying rje chen po dang / snying rje chen po la gnas pa mchog dang ldan zhing sems can
141a8(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa la zhugs pa dang / legs par
141b1(mdo sde): bgyid pa'i las bgyid pa dang / las kyi mtha' gdung ba ma mchis pa rnams lags// bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyi byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi phyir rgol ba bcom zhing the tsom dang bral nas de bzhin
141b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i yul la mngon du 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang
141b3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dag yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor tshar gcod par 'gyur ba
141b4(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang dag par 'ji/ na par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos thams cad la dang dang sgyur ba thob par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa blo shin
141b5(mdo sde): tu rnam par nges pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas mngon par 'phags pa'i chos kyi sgo de legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
141b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod legaso legs so// khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i
141b7(mdo sde): spyod yul tshad med pa la rnam par nges par thob nas/ khyod blo rnam par nges pa 'di lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa la do 'i 'dri bar sems pa ni skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so// de'i phyir rigs kyi
141b8(mdo sde): bu khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yon tan 'di dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang
142a1(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thob par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyugi rgya blo bac+doMs
142a2(mdo sde): legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ 
142a3(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan dang / ting 'dzin gyi rgyan dang / shes rab kyi rgyan dang / gzungs kyi rgyan ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni
142a4(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems pa/ dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni
142a5(mdo sde): gcig te/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sem sa can thams cad la gnod pa mi byed pa ste/ byang chu ba sems dpa' zhe sdang ba'i sems med pa ni sems can
142a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan gcig go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan
142a7(mdo sde): ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngan 'gro'i sgo gcod pa dang / bde 'gro'i sgo 'byed pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
142a8(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus rnam par dag pa dang / ngag rnam par dag pa dang / yid rnam par dag pa ste gsum po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub
142b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang 'dod pa de 'byor pa dang / gang smon pa de yang dag par 'grub pa dang / gang 'dod pa de thob pa dang // 
142b2(mdo sde): gang brtso ba de nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mu
142b3(mdo sde): khrims dang ldan pa'i ting 'dzin rgyu med pa yin/ shes rab rgyu med pa yin/ rnam par grol ba sgyu med pa yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba sgyu med pa yin/ yongasu mya ngan la
142b4(mdo sde): 'das pa chen po bla na med pa rgyu de nate/ lnga po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrim/ shes kyi rgyun ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
142b5(mdo sde): yid la gcags pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir skyon med pa 'i tshul khrims dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrim sa kyi phyir nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'dren ma
142b6(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir/ 'dres pa ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i chos shin tu rnam par 'phel ba'i phyir/ sra sre ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / gang gis 'dod par 'gro/ 
142b7(mdo sde): ba'i tshul khrims kyi phyir rang dga'i tshul khrims dang / gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i shes pas/ rang gi dbang sgyur ba'i tshul khrims te drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
142b8(mdo sde): rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa rnam pa dag pa dang / brtson 'grus rnam par
143a1(mdo sde): dag pa dang / bsam gtan rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa dang / thabs rnam par dag pa dang / bag yod pa rnam par dag pa ste/ bdun po 'di go// 
143a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa dun sum tshogs pa dang / sa phun sum tshogs pa dang // 
143a3(mdo sde): rnam par 'phro ba med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / lhod pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / khon du 'dzin pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa
143a4(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa dang / dal pa phun sum tshogs pa da dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mgu bar byed pa phun sum da tshogs pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub
143a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dgaste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jigs pa me/ nga ba yin/ skrag pa med pa yin/ bsam pa nges pa yin te// 
143a6(mdo sde): nye bar zhi ba yin/ bsil ba yin/ bcings pa lhod pa yin/ sems las su rung ba yin/ sems cad shes pa yin/ dul ba'i sa rje su thob pa yin te/ dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu
143a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yong su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ lus kyi rgyan dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin
143a8(mdo sde): byed pa'i phyir ngag gi rgyan dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir sems kyi rgyan dang / smon lam yong su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ zhing gi rgyan dang / bsam pa yongasu sbyong ba'i phyir sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i
143b1(mdo sde): rgyan dang / sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa'i phyir/ skye ba'i rgyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa la rjesu slob pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan dang / nga rgyal med pa'i phyir shes pa'i
143b2(mdo sde): rgyan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bsngo ba'i phyir/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang / tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba la gnas pa mi 'dor ba'i phyir/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
143b3(mdo sde): chos ma 'dres pa'i rgyan te/ rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan no// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting 'dzin gyi rgyan gang zhe na
143b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la byams pa ste/ 'di ni gcig go// 
143b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya na ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ drang ba dang / gnyen pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go/ 
143b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tingange 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu med pa dang g.yo med pa dang / bcos pa med pa ste/ gsum po 'di
143b7(mdo sde): dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma
143b8(mdo sde): yin par mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting 'dzin gyi/ 
144a1(mdo sde): rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa lnga spong ba ste/ lnga po de dag gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / gnod sems dang / 
144a2(mdo sde): rmugs pa dang / gnyid dang / rgod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / the tsom ste/ sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag spong ba'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting 'dzin gyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag
144a3(mdo sde): ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang / chos rje su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rje su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjesu dran pa dang / tshul khrims rje su dran pa dang / lha
144a4(mdo sde): rjesu dran pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems
144a5(mdo sde): mi brjed pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rab tu 'bye/ da pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag
144a6(mdo sde): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms
144a7(mdo sde): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ bdun po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting 'dzin gyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam
144a8(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa ste/ 'di ltar yang dag par lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i
144b1(mdo sde): rgol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin te/ brgyad po 'dig go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ti 'dzin gyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgug pazhen/ 
144b2(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjed pa med pa'i sems kyis snying rje chen po'i gnas la gnas te/ sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong bar gnas nas/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig
144b3(mdo sde): pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te
144b4(mdo sde): gnaso// de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongasu dag ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa me dad pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba
144b5(mdo sde): dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gan so// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyom/ sa la gnas shing / dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te
144b6(mdo sde): bde ba lus kyi myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnaso// 
144b7(mdo sde): de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang / dran pa yong su dag pa/ 
144b8(mdo sde): bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnaso// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du gas
145a1(mdo sde): rnams yid la ma byed pas na mkha' mtha' ya so snyanag rnam par tha' las skyem rnyed rdzogs par byed te gan so// den pa 'dun ma pa mtha la skye da sa la nag pa /  sde shA sa stod dri nga bye sa chos skyes go nga nga byes kyis
145a2(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 
145a3(mdo sde): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnaso// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog bri/ 
145a4(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang / thabs ma khas pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du yang mi byed/  la/ sngon gyi byin gyis rlabs kyis yang langs nas sems
145a5(mdo sde): can rnams kyang yongasu smin par byed pa ste/ ting 'dzin gyi rgya na ni dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub semasas dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag te
145a6(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pas nges par sems pa dang / zhi gnas yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa dang / mngon par brtson par mi 'dor ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog sbed pa
145a7(mdo sde): dang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi za ba dang / sems dben pa dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang / chos rnams la sems shing 'jal la so sor rtog pa dang / sems la dbang
145a8(mdo sde): sgyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs rab tu 'thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi / 
145b1(mdo sde): ra kyi rgya ga zhen/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyun ni gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la the tshom med pa ste/ 'di ni gcig go// \u0f7f
145b2(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ 'gyod pa dang bral ba dang / kun nas ldang ba bral ba ste/ gnyis
145b3(mdo sde): po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gti mu spong ba dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i
145b4(mdo sde): sbubs nges par gcog pa dang / mun pa mun nag sel ba ste/ gsum po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang / chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag
145b5(mdo sde): ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal ya ngasu shes par bya ba'i shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba spang ba'i snang ba dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon
145b6(mdo sde): gsal dang / lam bsgom pa'i byin gyis brlabs te/ bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyun ni lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
145b7(mdo sde): dmigs pa med pas tshul khrims kyi phung po yong su dag pa dang / shes rab mchog gi bsam gtan pa yin pas// ting 'dzin gyi phung po yong su dag pa dang / gnyis dang bral bas rnam par
145b8(mdo sde): grol ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid pas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongasu dag pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid pas// 
146a1(mdo sde): chos kyi phung po yongs su dag ste lnga po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor gsum
146a2(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid pas/ bdag gi 'khor yongasu dag pa dang / rmi lam dang mnyam pa nyid pas sems can gyi 'khor yongasu dag pa dang / rnam par smin
146a3(mdo sde): ba la re ba med pas/ byang chub kyi 'khor yongasu dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phyir lus kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / brag cha
146a4(mdo sde): lta bu'i shes pas ngag gi 'khor yongasu dag pa dang / sgyu ma dang / mnyam pa nyid pas sems kyi 'khor yongasu dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyes
146a5(mdo sde): par smras pa'i tshig rnams la khong khro ba med pa yongasu rig pa dang / bstod pa dang bsngags pa dang / rjes su 'chags pa spong ba yongasu dag pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag
146a6(mdo sde): gcod pa dag la chos kyi skul rab tu rtog pa yongasu dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khor ba rmi lam lta bur mos pas yongasu mi skyo ba yongasu dag pa dang / 
146a7(mdo sde): lta bu'i bsam pas brtan pa yong su dag pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad las sgrol bas/ blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med par yongasu dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha
146a8(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa ni 'gyur bar shes pas/ de las ma chags pa yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa med pas lhag mthong yongasu dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa skyed pas dmigs pa yong su dag pa'o// 
146b1(mdo sde): 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa'i thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can yongasu smin par byed pas bsdu ba'i dngos po yongasu dag pa dang / dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pas gzungs yong su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas/ 
146b2(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi rgyan gyi phyir smon lam yongasu dag pa ste drug po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa
146b3(mdo sde): nye bar bzhag pa rnams la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis lus dang
146b4(mdo sde): sems dben pa dang / dbang po rnams la dbang po yongs su shes pa dang / stobs rnams kyis bdud dang nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar gcod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
146b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang / lam rnams la 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med par shes pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
146b6(mdo sde): kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shin tu zhi ba'i phyir zhi gnas shes pa dang / rab rib dang bral ba'i phyir lhag mthong shes pa dang / chos kyi phung po
146b7(mdo sde): rjesu rtogs pa'i phyir phung po shes pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir khams shes pa dang / grong stong pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir skye mched shes pa dang / bdag med pa'i phyir rten cing
146b8(mdo sde): 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir bden pa shes pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu rtog pas chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa shes pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs
147a1(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi mtha' dag pas 'das pa shes pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
147a2(mdo sde): dag pas ma 'ongs pa shes pa dang / bar gyi mtha' dag pas/ da ltar byung ba shes pa dang / rgya chud mi za bas nges pa rnam pa shes pa dang / rkyen phye bar sgrub pas ma nges pa rnams shes pa dang
147a3(mdo sde): yongasu smin par byed pas/ log pa nyid du ma nges pa rnams shes pa dang / chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyi phyi
147a4(mdo sde): thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / 'dus ma bas kyis rab ba tu phye ba'i phyir/ 'phags pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ste/ dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub
147a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par bsgrub pa'i ma/ tshan nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang / yongasu rtog pa'i
147a6(mdo sde): mtshan nyid kyi phyir rmi lam lta bur shes pa dang / rnam par 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir smig rgyu lta bur shes pa dang / 'pho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pa dang / 'du
147a7(mdo sde): 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir mig yor lta bur shes pa dang / rkyen gyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir brag cha lta bur shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / de bzhin nyid gan
147a8(mdo sde): med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mi 'khrugs pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / 'dus byas dag 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
147b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni
147b2(mdo sde): gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa brjed pa med pa ste/ 'di ni gcig go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyun ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ 
147b3(mdo sde): gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kun tu 'dzin pa dang / 'dzin pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ 
147b4(mdo sde): gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don la mkhas pa dang / tshig 'bru la mkhas pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la ma khas pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang
147b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i tshig dang / rtsub pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / 
147b6(mdo sde): rab tu 'grol ba'i tshig dang / brdzun pa med pa'i tshig ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
147b7(mdo sde): thos pa thams cad kyi nang nas don la rton pa dang / yi ge'i tshogs thams cad kyi nang nas ye shes la rton pa dang / mdo sde thams cad kyi nang nas nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa dang / gang zag gi sgra
147b8(mdo sde): thams cad las chos nyid la rton pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las 'jig rten las 'das pa la rton pa ste/ lnga po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni drug 'i
148a1(mdo sde): 'di dag ste/ drugag pan na/ 'dis ste/ jiskang smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / bden pa'i rjes 'thun pa'i tshig rab tu 'thob pa dang / nga rgyal med pas gzung bar 'os pa'i
148a2(mdo sde): tshig dang / g.yo med pas blang bar 'os pa'i tshig dang / snying rje chen po la sbyor bas 'bras bu yod pa tshe ston pa dang / snod pa la mkhas pas chad par chos ston pa dang / 'jig rten shes pas dus su
148a3(mdo sde): chos ston pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag yin te/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mgyogs pa'i spobs pa dang / shugs
148a4(mdo sde): can gyi spobs pa dang / myur ba'i spobs pa dang / chagadas pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad med pa'i spobs dpa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / shin tu nges
148a5(mdo sde): pa'i tshig gi spobs pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go/ rig sa kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni/ brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i
148a6(mdo sde): skad shes pa dang / klu'i skad shes pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi skad shes pa dang / dri za'i skad shes pa dang / lha ma yin gyi skad shes pa dang / na mkha' lding gi skad shes pa dang / mi 'am ci'i skad
148a7(mdo sde): shes pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa nas/ sems can thams cad kyi bar gyi skad shes pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni dgu
148a8(mdo sde): po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor gyi nang du spu gong ba med pa dang / smra ba'i nang du zhum pa med pa dang / chos bshad pa'i nang du 'jigs pa med pa dang / 'dri ba rnams la nges par
148b1(mdo sde): 'byung ba shes pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams la snrel zhing bstan pa shes pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rjesu 'thun pa bstan pa shes pa dang / khengs pa dag la lag mardon ston/ 
148b2(mdo sde): pa dang / mngon par chags pa rnams la sreg pa'i bskal pa ston pa dang / yongasu smin pa rnams la theg pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa ste/ dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
148b3(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dongogs pa thams cad la the tsom med par ston pa shes pa dang / blos chos bskyed pa'i sgo dang / shes rab
148b4(mdo sde): kyi snang ba gzhan la rag ma las pa dang / yi ge bstan dpa'i mi zad pa dang / don bstan pa rgyun chad pa med pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa yang dag pa rab
148b5(mdo sde): turjod pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i skyon mu med parabarjod pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bsngags pa tshad med de/ ston pa dang / dbang po thams cad la gzhol bar 'jug pa
148b6(mdo sde): tshigs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi snang ba'i sa so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ga rdzas kyi rgyun ni bcu po 'jig no// denas
148b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang gis theg mchog dam pa 'di mdzes pa// blo gros chen po rnams kyi rgyan bzhi ste/ tshul khrim
148b8(mdo sde): ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab mchog/ shin tu rnam nges don dang de bzhin gzungs// de ni lus can kun gyi yid 'ong dga'// lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid dag cing // de yi rnam par lhung ba kun
149a1(mdo sde): 'chang pa 'di ni tshul khrims ldan pa'i rgyun yin no// lha mi rnams kyi nang du mkhas pa sde// de yi smon lam ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'grub// nan tan snying por byed dang yang dag ldan
149a2(mdo sde): 'di ni tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan yino// de yi ting 'dzin sgyu ma la yin te// shes rab rnam grol de bzhin ye shes mthong // de yi mya ngan 'das pa sgyu ma min// 'di ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i
149a3(mdo sde): rgyan/ tshul khrims skyon med tshul khrims rnam par dag/ tshul khrims sra sre ma yin 'dren ma med// de yi rang dga' de bzhin rang dbang yin// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// 
149a4(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyis ni sbyin pa dag par 'gyur// bzod pa dag cing de bzhin brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan dag / cing de bzhin shes rab dag/ thabs dang de bzhin bag yod
149a5(mdo sde): dag pa yin// g.yo ba med cing gtan la shin tu gnas// sa mchog thob cing rnal 'byor rnam 'phro med// lhong ba spangs shing dgang snga gso yang sla// 'di ni gang dag tshul
149a6(mdo sde): khrims dag pa'i rgyan// bcom ldan 'bar zhing tshul khrims bsngags pa ste// de'i sems ni nam yang gdung mi 'gyur// de la yid la gcags par 'gyur med de// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims/ 
149a7(mdo sde): dag pa'i rgyan// 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag mi zhum ste// bsam pa nges shing zhi la yi rab zhi// 'dir ni de yi bcing ba lhod par gyur// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// grags
149a8(mdo sde): chen sems ni lasu rung ba yin// de ni dul zhing de bzhin cang shes yid// 'di ni rang lus mtshan gyi brgyan byed pa// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ 
149b1(mdo sde): mkhas pa de ni ngag gi rgyan thob ste// de ni nyon mongs med pas rtag sems brgyan// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// khyad par 'phags pa'i zhing ni legs par rgyan// theg pa mchog la sems
149b2(mdo sde): can yongs smin te// gang phyir sdig pa thams mi byed pas// rang gi skye ba legs par brgyan pa byed// byang chub spyod pa rtag tu brgyan byed cing // byang chub snying po dam pa brgyan par byed// stobs
149b3(mdo sde): dang mi 'jigs pa dag brgyan byed cing // nga rgyal med pas shes pa legs par rgyan// de ni byams pas sems can kun khyab byed// mkhas pa rtag tu dran pa mnyen pa yin// g.yo med cing ni rgyu
149b4(mdo sde): med bcos pa med// gti mug 'dod sdang 'jigs pas 'gro dam yin// de ni sgrib pa lnga po rnam par sel// bag yod gyur nas rjesu lam drug sgom// byang chub yan lag bdun dang / 
149b5(mdo sde): lam sgom ste// mthar gyis dgu dang ting 'dzin bsam gtan byed// rnal 'byor pa ni zhi gnas nges sems sbyor// de ni tshul bzhin dge ba chung mi gzon/ dben dang shin tu sbyas
149b6(mdo sde): dang so sor rtog/ 'phags pa'i rigs la dbang ni sbyar ba yin// chos rnams la ni the tshom med par gyur// de la kun nas ldang dang 'gyod pa med// de la ma rig gti mug mun pa med// bden pa snang
149b7(mdo sde): zhing yongasu shes pa shes// tshul khrims dag pa dmigs pa med pa ste// shes rab dam pa bsam gtan ting 'dzin dag/ gnyis bsal nas ni rnam par grol ba dag/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal med kyi sa/ 
149b8(mdo sde): bdag/ dus gsum dgal ye shes mthong mi chags// 'dod chags bral ba'i shes pas chos kyang dag/ dganas 'di ni nga la rlong sems med// 'di ni gang ga shes dang ldan pa'i rgyad// shes rab
150a1(mdo sde): kyis ni sbyin pa brgyan gyur te// rmi lam sgyu ma tshol ba med pa'i phyir// bdagra dang byang chub de bzhin sems can rnams// 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par spyod// shes rab kyis ni
150a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims brgyan gyur te// gzugs brnyan sgyu ma brag cha 'dra ba'i phyir// lus dang ngag rnams dang ni de bzhin sems// 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong // shes rab kyis ni bzod par rgyan gyur te// 
150a3(mdo sde): mkhas dang mtho min dma' bar 'gyur min dang // dam pa'i chos sku rtag tu rab rtog pa// 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong // shes rab kyis ni brtson 'grus brgyan gyur te// skyo ba med cing bsam pa
150a4(mdo sde): brtan pa dang // de ni blang ba med cing dor med pa// 'khor gsum/ dpo dag de ni rnam par sbyong // shes rab kyis ni bsam gtan rgyan gyur te// de la ma chags 'gyur dang lhag mthong dang // 
150a5(mdo sde): mkhas dang mngon par shes pa bskyed pa dang // 'khor gsum po ngag de ni rnam par sbyong // shes rab kyis ni thabs kyang rgyan te/ ra te// shin tu bdud dang gzungs dang yang dag smon// 'khor
150a6(mdo sde): gsum po dag de ni rnam sbyong zhing // sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing rnams sbyong // dran pa nye bar gzhag la dran mi 'jug/ yang dag spong ba rnams la gnyis med de// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni lus dang sems kyang
150a7(mdo sde): dben sems can gyis ni dbang po kun mi shes// bdud dang nyon mongs rnams kyis zil mi non// chos kyi rang bzhin tshul bzhin rjesu rtogs// de bzhin lam la 'od med 'gro ba med// 'di ni gang dag she/ 
150a8(mdo sde): rab ldan pa'i rgyan// de ni shin tu zhi bas zhi gnas shes// de'i lhag mthong spyod yul mtha' yas te// chos kyi phung po ci bzhin phung po shes// khams ni na mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra bar shes// des ni stong pa
150b1(mdo sde): lta bur skye mched shes// rten pas bsags pas chos rnams 'byung med de// don dam bden par 'khrugs pa med par shes// tshul bzhin gyis ni nges par rtogs par shes// gsum la ni tshags med ye
150b2(mdo sde): shes 'jug rnam par gzhag phyir phung po gsum yang shes// dkon mchog gsum ni mtshan nyid gcig tu shes// 'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan// rnam bsgrubs mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bur shes// 
150b3(mdo sde): yongs brtags rtsa ba rmi lam ji bzhi no// rnam 'khrul mtshan nyid smig sgyu 'dra ba ste// 'pho med chos rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid do// 'du 'phrod byung ba mig yor lta bu ste// rkyen rnams kyis ni brag cha ji/ 
150b4(mdo sde): bzhin no// chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu ma 'dres shes// de bzhin nyid ni gnas med de rab shes// yang dag mtha' ni rtag tu mig yo chos// 'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas gnyis su med/ 
150b5(mdo sde): shes rab zab cing blo ni rab yangs pa// brgyan nas sangs rgyas chos rnams tshol bar byed// de ni nam yang dran pa brjed pa med// chos rnams kun du 'dzin cing 'dzin par byed/ 
150b6(mdo sde): don dang tshig 'bru la ni rtag tu mkhas// nges tshig shes pa rtag par rtogs khong chung // chags med tshig dang rtsub pa ma yin dang // rab tu grol ba'i tshig dang rdzun med tshig/ thos pa kun don
150b7(mdo sde): rtag tu rtog pa dang // mkhas pa de ni ye shes rton par byed// nges don mdo sde rtogs par rab tu shes// gang zag med pa'i chos nyid rton byed cing // 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos nyid la yang rton// 
150b8(mdo sde): de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa yin// de yi tshig ni bden pa'i rje su 'thun// gzung bar 'os dang dusu 'os pa yin// de yi chos bstan de ni 'bras bu yod// chad pa dang ni dus su rgyun chags 'jug/ 
151a1(mdo sde): de yi spobs pa mgyogs pa skye ba ste// shugs can dang ni myur dang rtag mi chags// rgyun chad med dang 'khrul med nges pa'i tshig/ legs par brgyus pa'i 'phreng bas legs
151a2(mdo sde): brgyan bzhin// lha dang klu yi skad ni rab tu shes// gnod sbyin dag dang dri za lha min dang // mkha' lding mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// sems can kun gyi skad kyang rab tu shes// 'khor lhags shes nA
151a3(mdo sde): sgra gong med pa ste// smra ba mthong nas zhum par 'gyur ba'ang med// 'jigs pa med par chos kyi gtan yang brjod// 'dri ba rnams la nges 'byung rab tu shes// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can mthong stel/ 
151a4(mdo sde): zhi yi/ gtam brjod rnal 'byor mthong nas rje su 'thun// nga rgyal can la lag na rdo rje ston// yul mngon cha dgas la sreg pa'i bskal pa ste// theg pa gsum gyi rim
151a5(mdo sde): pa'i gtam yang rjod// dogs pa kun gyi the tshom gcod ba ste// blo yis chos rnams mngon sum gyur pa yin// de yi shes rab nam yang gzhan mi ltos// yi ge thams cad
151a6(mdo sde): rtag tu zad med shes// don rnams nges pa dag la rgyun chags te// de ni sangs rgyas chos rnams mtha' yas brjod// de ni gzungs kyis rgyan par gyur pa yin// kun nas nyon mongs skyon ni mtha'
151a7(mdo sde): yas shes// rnam par byang ba'i phan yon thug pa med// de bzhin sems can dbang po thams cad shes// sangs rgyas snang ba'i so so rig pa thob// de ni gzungs kyis rgyan par gyur pa ste/ 
151a8(mdo sde): de yi yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag kyang // bskal par rgyun chad med par rab brjod kyang // yon tan mtha' ni rtogs par mi nus so// 
151b1(mdo sde): bam po gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu snang ba gang dag gis snang bar gyur na
151b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mun pa mun nag dang bral zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa spyod par 'gyur ba// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// brgyad
151b3(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa'i snang ba dang / blo gros kyi snang ba dang / rtogs pa'i snang ba dang / chos kyi snang ba dang / shes pa'i snang ba dang / bden pa'i snang ba dang / mngon
