230a6(mdo sde): gaM las dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i las dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de chos de lta bu dang ldan te/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems kyi bas
230a7(mdo sde): pa la 'jug pas so so ci rigs par chos ston to// zhag gcig gam/ zhag gnyis sam/ gsum sam/ zhag bdun nam/ zla ba byed dam/ zla ba
230a8(mdo sde): gcig gam dus sam/ lo khyud khor ram/ lo brgya 'am/ lo stong ngam/ lo brgya phrag stong ngam/ ji tsam du 'dod pa de tsam du kha zas dang bral ba'i rgyud kyis chos
230b1(mdo sde): sngon kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis shin tu yong su bzung ba'i phyir de'i chos kyi sgo yong su zad par mi 'gyur/ lus dang sems ngal bar mi 'gyur ro// 
230b2(mdo sde): shes pa chen po bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa
230b3(mdo sde): shes pa dang / theg pa ji ltar rnam par dgod pa shes pa dang / so so ci rigs rigs par chos ston pa shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi rgyan byin
230b4(mdo sde): gyis rlabs pa'i gzungs gang cung zad gzhol ba'i sgor 'judag pa zhes bya'o// gzungs 'di ni mi zad pa/ thug pa med pa'i rjes su song ba/ de bzhin ga
230b5(mdo sde): ba'i mtshams dang bcas pa/ bstan pa tshad med pa'o// / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzung sa ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ gzungs de la rab tu gnas/ 
230b6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun tu 'dzin to// chos ston pa ni mi zad par 'gyur ro// legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad
230b7(mdo sde): tshim par byed par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bde gshegs rnams kyis rab tu gsungs
230b8(mdo sde): pa'i gzungs brgyad po// theg pa 'dir ni de dag rnam par nges thob pa// mdo sde bye ba stong phrag thug pa med 'chad kyang // 'di ni don dang tshig 'bru gang la'ang chags pa med// 
231a1(mdo sde): yid 'ong shin tu snyan cing chags par 'gyur ba'i dbyings/ bye ba stong phrag tshad med zhing dugo byed pa/ sems can rnams kyis de thos mya ngan 'das par 'gro
231a2(mdo sde): sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa'i gzungs 'di thug pa med/ yi ge thams cad shes pa mkhas pa blo gros ldan// bskal pa mang por 'chad kyang chos la zad pa med pa/ rtsa ba'i tshig
231a3(mdo sde): gcig brjod pa'ang zad par mi 'gyur te/ mi zad chos kyi za ma tog 'di dran pa'i sa/ gang gis gzungs thob mtha' mar thug par yongs bcad pa/ mnyam nyid tshul bzhin
231a4(mdo sde): chos la sems pa blo gros ldan mthar 'dzin tha dmas cad rnam par spangs te/ yongs dag pa/ khyu mchog gyur pa de ni dbus la gnas mi 'gyur/ 
231a5(mdo sde): gang gis mtsho chen phyag rgya'i gzungs ni rab thob pade yi kha nas phyag rgya bsam yas rjod pa na/ gang dag gling bzhi'i gzugs kyi rnam pa ji snyed pa// de ngag
231a6(mdo sde): kun dang rgya mtsho chen bcas mi rtog/ 'khor du gal te bdag nyid chen po de chos sngon// nam mkha' las ni pad ma ngag gi char chen 'bab// pad ma dag las chos rnams bye ba rab tu
231a7(mdo sde): 'byung / 'di ni pad ma bkod pa'i gzungs te yongs su dag/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs ni gal te thob gyur na// tshig gcig brjod pa rab tu smra dang gnyis dag dang / 
231a8(mdo sde): gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang bye ba dag dang ni// khrag khrig thug pa med pa smra la chags pa med// gang gis rnam par gdon mi za ba'i gzungs thob pa// don dang chos dang nges tshig slob
231b1(mdo sde): pa ji snyed pa// phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed mang pos yongs dris na// de dag the tshom kun bcad dogs pa med par 'gyur// gang gis sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzungs thob
231b2(mdo sde): pa/ gzi brjid chen po de ni stan la 'dug pa na// sangs rgyas phyag g.yas de yi spyi bor 'jog mdzad de// de yang rgyal ba'i spobs pa ci 'dra bzhin du 'gyur// gang gis
231b3(mdo sde): gzungs rnams 'di dag rab tu thob gyur pa// de yi yon tan bsam yas thug pa med 'gyur te// gang ga'i snyed kyis bskal pa bye ba stong brjod kyang // khyu mchog gyur pa'i
231b4(mdo sde): bsngags pa brjod pas zad pa med// gang gis ga dazungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ de yi shes pa srid pa gsum la mnyam 'jug ste/ 
231b5(mdo sde): pad ma bzhin du srid pa gsum las 'phags 'gyur zhing / ri rab bzhin du yul rnams kyis ni mi skyod 'gyur/ gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ 
231b6(mdo sde): de ni srid kun rnam par spangs pa'i spyad spyod de/ mu stegs can gyi tshogs kun 'jom pa sgrog pa na// seng ge bzhin du 'khor du 'jig pa med par 'gyur// sa ltar dge ba rnams
231b7(mdo sde): ni rnam par skyed par 'gyur// chu ltar dri ma rnams ni rab tu ded par 'gyur// me ltar rlom sems med cing rnam rtog med par 'gyur// rlung ltar yul rnams la ni chags pa med
231b8(mdo sde): bar 'gyur// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de ni sna tshe shes dang dbang po 'khrug pa med// de ni sman pa bzhin du 'gro ba thar byed 'gyur// phan par 'dod pas tshas
232a1(mdo sde): kyi bkru sman sbyin par byed// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur ba// skye bo chog rje la lta bas mi ngoms te// zla ba bzhin du dge bdag
232a2(mdo sde): ni rnam sbyor 'gyur// sems snyoms gzi brjid chen po 'od zer mnyam par gtong // gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de ni 'gro ba'i sred pa ma lus skams par
232a3(mdo sde): byed/ nyi ma bzhin du 'ong byed mun pa sel bar 'gyur// gnyid log sems can srid pa gsum las sad par byed// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// 
232a4(mdo sde): de ni kun la cung zad tsam yang 'dzin pa med// de ni rgyal po bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug che// rnam thos bu bzhin nor ldan chos rnams ston par byed// gang gis
232a5(mdo sde): gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// rdzu 'phru/ la chen po dran ldan klu dang 'drar 'gyur te/ sprin gyi bya ba byed cing mkha' las klog phyung nas// zhi
232a6(mdo sde): bar bya phyir de ni chos kyi char pa 'bebs// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// 'khor rnams thams cad khyu mchog gyur pa'i gdong du lta// brgya byin bzhin
232a7(mdo sde): du smad pa ma yin gzugs mchog ldan// blo chen 'gro ba rnams la chos dang don rnams sems// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa
232a8(mdo sde): yongs dag bsam gtan byed// tshangs pa bzhin du mnyam bzhag snying rje ldan par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di kun zil gyis mnan nas bsam gtan byed// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog
232b1(mdo sde): rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mang la mchod pa byed// de ni rtag tu mngon shes lnga las nyams mi 'gyur// zhing brgya bsam gyis mi khyab dag tu mkha' nas
232b2(mdo sde): 'gro/ gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de ni ring por mi thogs sangs rgyas yon ton 'thob// phyogs na rgyal ba rnams ni de yi bsngags brjod de/ 
232b3(mdo sde): bu gcig pa zhig yon tan ldan pa bzhin du bstod// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de yi spobs pa 'brel pa legs brgyus ji bzhin te// mdo sde zab
232b4(mdo sde): mo sna tshogs mang po 'chang pa na// spobs pa rgya che yang das shing zad pa med par 'gyur// gang gis gzu dngas kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de la rgyag
232b5(mdo sde): pa med cing g.yo med nga rgyal med// dran ldan blo gros ldan zhing blo ldan rtogs dang ldan// ye shes ma tha' yas spyod yul na mkha' bzhin du 'gyur/ 
232b6(mdo sde): gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de yis 'dus byas nyes pa thams cad rab tu chang // shes rab ye shes thabs dang zung du 'brel par 'gyur/ 
232b7(mdo sde): byams dang snying rje dag kyang zung du 'brel bar 'gyur// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de ni smra tshe 'khrul pa cung zad mi dmigs te// bdag nyid che
232b8(mdo sde): de sems can rnams kyi sgra skad shes// spyod dang dbang po dang ni mos pa thams cad shes// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// des ni chos la lhag mthong dge dang dran
233a1(mdo sde): pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang ni spong dang dbang po stobs lnga dang // byang chub yan lag de bzhin lam mchog ni gnas 'thob// gang gis
233a2(mdo sde): gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de ni bde gshegs rnams kyi spyod yul rang gis rtogs// pha rol phyin pa dag gis kun gyi pha rol son// bsdu ba'i dngos pos kun la
233a3(mdo sde): mkhas shing blo gros ldan// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de la nam yang 'khrul pa cung zad mi dmigs te// nges pa de ni zhi zhing nyer zhi myos pa med// 
233a4(mdo sde): de ni spyod la rab tu gnas gyur shin tu dul// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de ni bde gshegs spyan sngar pad ma'i steng na 'dug/ 
233a5(mdo sde): yi lus ni chos rgyus byung ba rdul dang bral// de yi lus la mngal gyi dri mas gos mi 'gyur// gang gis gzu ngas kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa// de ni rgyal ba
233a6(mdo sde): kun gyis byin brlabs chos smra ste// de ni lus dang ngag yid las rnams gang byed pa// thams cad shes pas byas te skye bo phan par byed// gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab
233a7(mdo sde): tu thob gyur pa// de ni sna chi sngags pa zang par mi 'gyur te// sems can thams cad 'dren pa shes rab cher gyur kyang // de yi sngags pa bskal pa mang por bsam mi
233a8(mdo sde): khyab// bam po bdun pa ste tha ma'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal
233b1(mdo sde): she bya date/ u su tu tsun kyis ru dpa das pa sa bas gang dang / srir dang byod mo di dug thos ga padang / jisar bang khyo rjon byi bzhini gshegs pa rnams kyi gsug kyi sto tshig papa rornams 'os su dri'i ring bzhin can du
233b2(mdo sde): gyur pa leg so lags so// de'i phyir gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya'o// gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
233b3(mdo sde): na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa// rgyas pa tshad med pa// bsam gyis mi khyadab chu de'i tshe de'i dus na// rnam par snang byed kyi bskal pa la/ 
233b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom 'ang das shes bya ba'i bar du gyur pa 'jig rten du byung ngo // 
233b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa de yang bai DUr+ya dag par gyur te// me long lta bur shin tu byi dor byas pa lag mthil ltar mnyam pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams
233b6(mdo sde): der rin che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rin po che'i yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bur ldan pa dag byung bar gyur to// 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi pad ma tshad shing
233b7(mdo sde): rta'i pang lo tsam du gyur pa/ sna chog pa lta na sdug pa dag kyang byung bar gyur to// lha dang mi dag kyang rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa la yongs su longs spyod par gyur to// zas dang
233b8(mdo sde): nom ya bsam pa tsam gyis 'byor te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi langs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa lta dang mi dag gi longs spyod dang / ma
234a1(mdo sde): su spyod pa yang de 'dra bar gyur to// lha dang mi de dag kyang 'dod chags chung ba/ zhe sdang chung ba/ gti mug chung ba rnam par bzang ba shin tu rnam par byed par gyur/ 
234a2(mdo sde): to// 'jig rten gyi khams de na nyi ma dang / zla bar btags pa rnams med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i lus kyi 'od kyis thams cad
234a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsal bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams den pad ma kha zums pas mtshan mo zhes bya ba dang / pad ma kha bye bas nyin mor bgrangs pa ma gtogs par
234a4(mdo sde): nyin mtshan du gdags pa med do// bcom ldan 'ang / sa de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i byang/ chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' rab tu
234a5(mdo sde): byung ba snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag drug bcur gyur to// khyim pa tshad med pa dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang
234a6(mdo sde): dag par zhugs par gyur to// de na theg pa chen po ma gtogs par theg pa rnam par dgod pa gzhan med par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de ni phyir mi ldog pa dag pa'i gtam yang dag par
234a7(mdo sde): ston to// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa phyed du gyur to// mi rnams kyang bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byed pa med par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gang dag sa la gnas pa'i khang
234a8(mdo sde): pa brtsegs pa rnams na gnas pa de dag ni mi zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// gang dag na mkha' la gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnams na gnas pa de dag ni lha zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba ma
234b1(mdo sde): gtogs par/ lha dang mi rnams kyi kha dog dang yongs su spyod pa tha dad du bya ba med par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po bla na med pa de ma gtogs par
234b2(mdo sde): rgyal po gzhan gang yang med do// lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las byed pa dang / chos nyan pa la 'dun par gyur pa ma gtogs par lha gzhan med// 
234b3(mdo sde): ston pa gzhan med gzhan la phyag mi 'tshal/ las gzhan mi byed/ gzhan yid la mi byed par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni bud med du gdags pa med do// sems
234b4(mdo sde): can de dag bslab pa gsum po dag la slob pa ma gtogs par ltung bar gdags pa med do// bslab pa las 'da' bar gdags pa med do// bslab pa gsum gang
234b5(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi ba slab pa dang / lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa'o// de la lhag pa'i
234b6(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi bslab pa gang zhe na/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mi gtong ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad rnam par spong ba'o// de la lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa
234b7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ gang ting 'dzin la rab tu gnas nas lhag pa'i shes rab thob pa'o// de la lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa gang zhe na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu gnas
234b8(mdo sde): nas so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni lung phog pa med par bslab pa 'di lta bu dag la slob pa dag go/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni de lta bur yongs su
235a1(mdo sde): dag par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de'i chos bstan pa yang de lta bur yongs su dag par gyur to// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du
235a2(mdo sde): 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa de stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs gzungs shes bgyi/ 
235a3(mdo sde): na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dag gzungs gang la rab tu gnas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun tu 'dzin pa dang / chos bstan pa na zad
235a4(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur ba dang / legs par bshad pas se/ sems can thams cad tshim par bgyid pa'i gzungs degang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
235a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba des byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir de bzhin ga
235a6(mdo sde): ba la don 'di yongasu 'dri bar sems pa leg so legs so// rigs kyi bu rin chen sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gzungs de la rab tu gnas nas/ 
235a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun tu 'dzin to// legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
235a8(mdo sde): pa dri ma med par snang ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas bdag cag de bzhin du sgrub cing gzungs 'di 'thob par
235b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pas rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs la gang cung zad 'jug pa tsam zhig legs par bshad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang bas byang
235b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'od dpal la tshigs su bcad te bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs rnams kyi rdul dang bral gyur te// dri ma med cing dri ma kun tu spangs// sems ni rtag tu dag cing dri
235b3(mdo sde): med pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// lus kyis ngag rnamag cing yid kyis ni// zla ba lta bur dri bral dri med 'ong // byams pa'i sems dang yid kyang snyoms gyur pa/ 
235b4(mdo sde): 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// gnyis su da lta ba dag las rnam grol zhing // rtog dang rnam par rto/ ngag dang kun tu bral// 'du shes rnams ni yongasu shes gyur pa/ 
235b5(mdo sde): 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// dran dang blo gros rtogs la 'jug par 'grub// shes rab che ldan yon tan rnams dang ldan// nam mkha'i dkyil ltar dri ma
235b6(mdo sde): med cing dag/ 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// dkon mchog gsum po rgyan mi 'chad pa dang // dri gsum rnam spangs srid pa gsum las grol// gnyis la yid gnyis za ba
235b7(mdo sde): mthar 'byin pa// rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs ni dag pa yin// 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang gti mug bcom// dus ngan skyon spangs yon tan kun dang ldan// nyon mongs mun pa rab rib sel byed
235b8(mdo sde): ba/ rin chen sgron ma gzungs kyi mchog yin no// 'jig rten dag na sgra skad tha ma dang // 'bring dang mchog ni ji snyed yod pa dag/ sgra rnams kun la shin tu zhugs gyur pa// rin chen rnon
236a1(mdo sde): ma'i gzungs ni rdul dang bral// zab mo'i tshogs rnams dang ni ldan gyur cing // tshig dang yig 'bru sna tshogs mtha' yas mang // bdag dang sems can dag tu lhung ba med// 
236a2(mdo sde): gnyis med ldan pa 'di ni gzungs yin no// so so yang dag rig pa thob gyur cing // rkang pa snying po bzhi la rab gnas te// bsam gtan bzhi dang yang dag rab ldan pa// 'di ni rin
236a3(mdo sde): chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// dam pa'i don gyi chos kyi tshul gyur cing // tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang bsdu dang ldan// mngon par shes pa lnga la 'gro byed pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron
236a4(mdo sde): ma'i gzungs yin no// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnamasad la gnas// yang dag spong ba rnams dang rtag tu 'thu da na// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi la spyod byed pa// 'di ni rin chen
236a5(mdo sde): sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// dbang po lnga po dag dang ldan gyur cing // stobs lnga dag la gnas pa mi g.yo'i shugs// byang chub yan lag rnams dang rab ldan pa/ 
236a6(mdo sde): 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyis 'gro byed cing // zhi gnas mchog dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel// rig dang rnam par grol bas 'gro byed pa// 
236a7(mdo sde): 'di ni rin sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// sa rnams gnon pa dag ni rab ldan zhing // mtshams sbyor grol ba'i lam dang rje su 'thun// nyes pa rnams ni kun tu spangs gyur pa// 'di ni rin
236a8(mdo sde): chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// 'jig rten thams cad na ni snang byed cing // nyi ma zla ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ltar// rnam par dag cing mig ni 'byed byed pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs
236b1(mdo sde): yin no// 'dir ni lha mig dag ste rab rib med// shes rab mchog gi mig kyang rnam par dag/ 'dir ni chos kyi mig kyang dag gyur te// rgyal ba dam pa'i spyan ni rnam par dag
236b2(mdo sde): 'dir ni nyon mongs bdud kyang dag par gyur// phung po lnga yi nyes pa 'dir yongs dag/ 'dir ni 'chi bdag bdud kyang ngag gyur cing // 'di ni sde dang bcas pa'i bdud kyang bcom/ 
236b3(mdo sde): 'dir ni gzungs la rab tu gnas nas su// bye ba khrag khrig dag gi zhing du 'gro/ sangs rgyas khrag khrig dag kyang mthong 'gyur zhing // bla na med pa'i chos kyang nyan par byed/ 
236b4(mdo sde): rgya chen chos ni thos par gyur nas kyang // gzungs kyi dan pa'i stobs kyis 'dzin par byed// don dang tshig 'bru dag kyang zung ldan par// sems ldan thams cad la
236b5(mdo sde): ni ston par byed// rgyu dang rkyen gyis rnam par phye bas na/ sems ni skad cig 'jigs par shes gyur te/ chos rnams rab tu dbye ba shes thob pa// gzungs 'di la
236b6(mdo sde): ni gnas par gyur pa yin// spobs pa thob cing gsum rigs chags pa med// mig gsum rnam par dag pa'ang rab tu thob// rnam par thar pa gsum gyi don kyang thob// 'dir
236b7(mdo sde): ni gzungs rnams thob par 'gyur dang ldan// gang dag gzungs rnams mang po gzhal yas shing // tshad med pa dag nges par bstan pa yang // gzungs kyi dam pa 'di ni thob gyur na/ 
236b8(mdo sde): de dag thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur// bsam gtan gang dag rnam par gang dag dang // snyoms 'jug ting 'dzin gang dag mtha' yas dang // mngon par shes pas rnam par rol dang
237a1(mdo sde): gzungs// mtha' yas de dag la ni rab tu 'jug/ ji ltar rgya mchod pag tu med pa la// mtha' yas sgo nas rlung mtsho mtshe'u 'jug pa// de ltar gzungs 'di
237a2(mdo sde): 'dzin par byed pa yang // mtha' yas chos rnams kyi ni sgo mor 'jug/ zad pa med pa'i sgra la 'jug pa yang // zad pa med pa'i shes pas khong du chung // gzungs 'di smra bar byed pa de yi
237a3(mdo sde): ni/ bsod nams thams cad zad par mi 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di rab tu thob par gyur pa ni// rin chen dam pa dri med lag tu 'gyur// gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang ni rigs dang
237a4(mdo sde): yang rus dang skye ba dag ni rnam par dag/ zab mo'i chu la dag la ni 'jug pa dang // mi skye ba la bzod dang ma skyes dang // phyir mi ldog pa'i shes pa'i sa dag kyang / 
237a5(mdo sde): gzungs 'di rab tu thob par gyur na ni// byang chub bla na med/ pa rnyed mi dka'// gang dag phyogs bcu rnams na bde/ bar gshegs// 'gro la pan dang bde phyir chos ston pa// 
237a6(mdo sde): gzungs kyi dam pa 'di na thob gyur na// de dag spobs pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di rab tu thob par gyur pa dag/ dga' dang mos dang bsam pa shes nas ni// de dag 'bras bu
237a7(mdo sde): yod pa ston pas na// sems can khrag khrig dag ni tshim par byed// gzungs 'di la ni gnas pa'i dpa' bo dag/ 'khor lo dam pa rab tu bskor byed cing // sems can sdug bsngal sna
237a8(mdo sde): tshogs rnams las 'grol// theg pa dam pa la yang 'jog par byed// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por ni// bsngags dang yon tan legs par brjod byas kyang // drang srong chen pos de'i
237b1(mdo sde): yon tan gyi// mtha' ma brjod du nus par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba des gzungs bstan pa 'di bshad pa na// byang chub
237b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de las byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis gzungs thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpal gyis ni rin chen
237b3(mdo sde): sgron ma'i gzungs 'di thob par gyur to// gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs
237b4(mdo sde): shing / yid gnyi su gyur tam/ the tshom za ba lta na khyod da kyis de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od
237b5(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya bar gyur te/ gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod kyis de tshun chad bgrang ba las 'das pa'i de ba zhin gshegs pa dag la gzungs rnam par nges pa 'di yongasu
237b6(mdo sde): dris so// yongasu dri ba byas so// des na khyod da ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pa la yongasu 'dri ba la de ltar 'jigs pa med cing / gzungs kyi rnam par nges pa 'di'ang ston to// 
237b7(mdo sde): khyod kun tu lta ba'i blos chos chos 'di mngon sum du gyur pas/ rnam grangs 'dis na ngas khyod byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang ldan pa rnams
237b8(mdo sde): kyi mchog tu bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs shes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dug par gyur pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
238a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin chen sgro no gzungs 'di rab tu 'thob cing / thob nas kyang chab 'tshal bar mi bgyid pa dang / 'di lta ste
238a2(mdo sde): gzungs kyi stobs bskyed pas sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs la 'di
238a3(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rtsa ba la gnas par gyur pa dang / shes rab kyi las byed par gyur pa de'i tshe/ gzungs 'di rab tu
238a4(mdo sde): thob bo// chud za bar mi byed do// sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar yang 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sem
238a5(mdo sde): dpa' shes rab brtsegs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi rtsa ba ni gang lags shes rab kyi las ni gang lags/ de bzhin gshegs
238a6(mdo sde): pas legs par bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// 
238a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ma thos pa'i chos nyan pa gang yin 'di ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// ji ltar thos pa'i chos gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa gang yin pa 'di ni shes kyi
238a8(mdo sde): las so// dpyod pa shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// gang dpyang pa gzhan dag la nye bar ston pa 'di ni shes rab kyi las so// tshul bzhin so sor rtogs pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// sems can rnams tshul
238b1(mdo sde): bzhin la rab tu dgod pa 'di ni shes rab kyi las so// yang dag par sbyor ba ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'i// yang dag par sgrub pa ni shes rab kyi las so// sems la nges par sems pa ni shes rab kyi
238b2(mdo sde): rtsa ba'o// sems la nges par sems pa yang dag par ston pa ni shes rab kyi las so// rab tu dben par gnas pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// lus dang sems dben par shes pa shes rab kyi
238b3(mdo sde): las so// gcig pur dga' ba ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// gcig pur dgod pa'i lam sgrub pa ni shes rab kyi las so// zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// 
238b4(mdo sde): rigs pa dang rnam par grol ba 'thob pa ni shes rab kyi las daso// rnam par thar pa gsum sgom pa ni shes rab kyi/ rtsa ba'o// rigs pa gsum mngon sum du byed pa ni shes
238b5(mdo sde): rab kyi las so// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom pa ni shesarab kyi rtsa ba'o// dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa ni shes rab kyi las so// yang dag par spong ba sgom pa ni
238b6(mdo sde): shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis spangs par rab tu shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// mngon par 'du bya ba
238b7(mdo sde): med par rdzu 'phrul thob pa ni shes rab kyi las so// dad pas mos te yid ches pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba ni shes rab kyi las so// 
238b8(mdo sde): sems mi 'jug pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa ni shes rab kyi las so// dran pa dang shes bzhin ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// dran pas bya ba rjes su dran pa ni shes
239a1(mdo sde): rab kyi las so// ting nge 'dzin rim gyis rjes su rtogs par byed pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// rtag tu mnyam par gnas pa 'thob pa ni shes rab kyi las so// shes rab kyi dang
239a2(mdo sde): po la rten pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// stobs lnga'i gan gre ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// bdud dang nyon mongs pas mi rdzi ba ni shes
239a3(mdo sde): rab kyi las so// byang chub kyi yan lag dang rjesu 'thun pa'i bzod pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa ni shes rab kyi las so// lam gyi yan lag yang
239a4(mdo sde): dag par sgrub pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos thams cad da gzings lta bur shes nas chos dang chos ma yin pa la mi gnas pa ni shes rab kyi las so// sdug bsngal dang
239a5(mdo sde): kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam sgom pa ni she/ sa rab kyi rtsa ba'o// 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa ni shes rab kyi las so// drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde kun chub par
239a6(mdo sde): byed pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// nges pa'i don gyi mdo la rton pa ni shes rab kyi las so// thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// don la rton pa ni shes rab kyi las so// rnam par shes
239a7(mdo sde): pa la so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// ye shes la rton pa ni shes rab kyi las so// gang zag gi sgra la mngon par zhen pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos nyid la rton pa ni shes rab kyi
239a8(mdo sde): las so// 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// gdong ma nas ma skyes par rab tu shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal bar
239b1(mdo sde): so so rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med par shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// chos thams cad la bdag med par so so rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// sems
239b2(mdo sde): can bzod ma nas rnam par dag par shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// mya ngan las 'das pa la zhi bar so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya
239b3(mdo sde): ngan las 'das par shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// don thos nas skrag pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// don so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes rab kyi las so// yang dag pa'i chos
239b4(mdo sde): nyid thos nas skrag pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos/ so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes rab kyi las so// nges pa'i tshig thams cad la skrag pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa
239b5(mdo sde): ba'o// nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes rab kyi las so// sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa thos nas skrag pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// spobs pa so
239b6(mdo sde): so yang dag par rig pa ni shes rab kyi las so// sems can la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa ni shes rab
239b7(mdo sde): kyi las so// bdag la med pa dang / gzhan la med pa la snying rje ba ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// mtha' gnyi ga bsal ba'i snying rje chen po ni shes rab kyi las so// chos la sems
239b8(mdo sde): pa la mchog tu dga' bar byed pa'i dga' ba ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa ni shes rab kyi las so// rjes su 'chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba'i
240a1(mdo sde): btang snyoms ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// gnyis dang bral ba ni shes rab kyi las so// sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos kyi sku rab tu shes pa ni shes
240a2(mdo sde): rab kyi las so// chos rjesu dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// dge 'dun rjesu dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// 'dus ma
240a3(mdo sde): byas su so sor rtogs pa ni shes rab kyi las so// gtong ba rjesu dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba ni shes rab kyi las so// tshul khrims rjes su dran
240a4(mdo sde): pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// tshul khrims mngon par 'du bya ba med par shes pa ni shes rab kyi la so// lha rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid
240a5(mdo sde): ni shes rab kyi laso// thos pa la rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// 'jig rten thams cad la rtog pa ni she sa rab kyi las so// ma byas pa'i las byed pa ni shes rab
240a6(mdo sde): kyi rtsa ba'o// las kyi rnam par smin pa med par shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// nga rgyal med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// ye shes chen po thob pa ni shes rab kyi las so// bdag gi
240a7(mdo sde): don ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// gnyis ga'i don ni shes rab kyi las so// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong kun tu 'dzin pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong yongs/ 
240a8(mdo sde): shi ni shes rab kyi las so// chos bstan pa shes pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa ni shes rab kyi las so// sems can rnams byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
240b1(mdo sde): ba ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu 'god pa 'di ni shes rab kyi las so// srid par 'gro ba
240b2(mdo sde): skye ba thams cad kyis skrag pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// bsams bzhin du skye ba ni shes rab kyi las so// sgra'i rjesu 'gro ba'i bzod pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// bsgoms pa las byung ba'i/ 
240b3(mdo sde): bzod pa ni shes rab kyi las so// zang ba shes pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// mi skye ba'i shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// rjesu 'thun pa'i bzod pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// mi skye
240b4(mdo sde): ba'i chos la bzod pa ni shes rab kyi las so// phyir mi ldo// ga pa'i sa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// dbang skur ba'i/ sa ni shes rab kyi las so// byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa/ 
240b5(mdo sde): ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// gang ci shes par bya ba dang / thob par bya ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba de thams cad sems kyi/ 
240b6(mdo sde): skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'di ni shes rab kyi las so// shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang las bstan pa 'di
240b7(mdo sde): bshad pa na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// 
240b8(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma
241a1(mdo sde): mchis pa 'di dag rab tu g.yos par gyur pa dang / namakha' la gnas pa'i 'khor gyi khyams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur pa'i phyu gang lags/ rkyen
241a2(mdo sde): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang las bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon bshad pa na// 
241a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyod nyid kyis na mkha' yongasu 'dzin pa 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la yongs su dris shing yongs su dri ba byas te/ sa chen po g.yos pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu ni 'di yi no// 
241a4(mdo sde): rkyen ni 'di yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa la spobs/ pa zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
241a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs pa la shes rab brtsegs shes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sngon
241a6(mdo sde): byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ dri ma med pa'i bskal pa la 'jig rten khams 'byung ba bzang po na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba'i bar du
241a7(mdo sde): gyur pa 'jig rten du byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba bzang po de'i sems can rnams ni bde bar tshim pas gnas par gyur to// de bzhin gsheg pa dpal sbas de'i byang chub sems
241a8(mdo sde): dpa'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsaganyi su gyur to// de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni nyan thos stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhir gyur to// rigs kyi bu de ltar bcom ldan 'ang
241b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas des byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi spobs pa rgya chen po nye bar gzung ste/ dri ba bye ba phrag brgya ched du mdzad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka'
241b2(mdo sde): stsal pa skyes bu dam pa khyed kyi nang nas su dus ji srid gcig na dri ba phrag brgya po 'di dri ba re re la bstan pa bye brag brgya brgyas las lan 'debs par spro// de'i nang nas byang chub
241b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' kha cig gis gsol pa/ mtshan mo 'dibs te lan gdab par bgyi'o// kha cig gis gsol pa/ dgung bdun na'o// kha cig gis gsol pa
241b4(mdo sde): dgung zla phyed na'o// kha cig gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dri bas 'di dag bdag cag gi dgu dang zla gcig na lan gdab par bgyi'o// de'i tshe byang chub
241b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' dran pa'i blo zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te/ 'dug par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas de la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
241b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag bstan las mi ldang zhing spyod lam 'khrug pa ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pa dbang du bgyi ste/ dri ba 'di bas par lan gdab par bgyi'o// skyes bu dam pa nges
241b7(mdo sde): seng ge'i sgra sgrags ma thag tu de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// snang ba chen po yang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to// snang ba nges
241b8(mdo sde): bskul nas sa bla'i lha nas bzung ste/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams 'dus so// dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag mang po yang 'dir/ 
242a1(mdo sde): 'dus par gyur to// de ltar skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la dpag tshad stong phrag bcur 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu gnas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems
242a2(mdo sde): dpa' dran pa'i blos 'khor 'dus pa chen po de mthong nas/ rang gi bsod nams kyi stobs dang / ye shes kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / gzungs kyi stobs dang spobs
242a3(mdo sde): pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa'i stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / stobs kyi dri ba ched du mdzad pa bye ba phrag brgya po de kun tu bzungs nas/ bcom ldan
242a4(mdo sde): 'das de'i spyan sngar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'i mdun du dri ba bye ba phrag brgya po re re la bstan pa'i bye ba phrag brgyas/ delan btab ste/ zang pa dang / rgyun chang ba med
242a5(mdo sde): pa dang / rjes su ldan pa dang / rjes 'brel ba tshig dang yig 'brur ldan pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i tshig rnams kyis de'i lan btab pa
242a6(mdo sde): 'khor de las srog chags stong phrag drug bcus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bsgred ngo // byang chub sems dpa' stong brag bani bcu ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu
242a7(mdo sde): bgyu s+ho// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa da la sras des de la logs shes bya ba dz+rIn / legs sa zhes bya ba'i skangs kyang gsum kyi stong chen pol jig rten gyi kha
242a8(mdo sde): dngas kyi go bar byas so// sa bla'i lha'i rnams nas badz+rang ste/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis skyem gang shes rab dang / spongs pa dang / bstan pa 'di 'dra ba 'dzin byang / 
242b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs su 'gyur ro zhes sgra phyung ste sgra bsgrags so// de ltar na de shes rab brtsegs shes rab brtsegs shes ming du btags so// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i
242b2(mdo sde): dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i blo zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du dogs shing yid gnyis su gyur tam/ the tshom za ba lta na khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o// 
242b3(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs 'di nyid de'i tshe/ de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i blo zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom
242b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis don 'di rgya cher brjod pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// ma mos gyur nas ma thos chos rnams rtag nyan pa// shes rab rtsab sems
242b5(mdo sde): can dag pas thos nas ni// 'dzin cing byams pas 'gro bdag la ston byed pa/ shes rab las te byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu byed// dpyod pa'i dran pa chen po
242b6(mdo sde): 'di ni shes rab rtsa// dpyad nas 'gro la rtag tu ston pa shes rab la// gal te tshul bzhin rab sreg 'di ni shes rab rtsa// de la sbyar nas ston pa shes rab las shes bya// yang
242b7(mdo sde): dag sbyor la gal te sbyor ba shes rab rtsa// grub cing ston par byed pa de ni shes rab las// sems la nges par sems rnyed 'di ni shes rab rtsa// nges par sems par spyod pa 'di ni shes
242b8(mdo sde): rab las// gcig pu dben par spyod pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa// lus dang sems la nga'i med pa ni shes rab las// gang tshe 'du 'jis 'jigs gyur de ni shes rab rtsa// gcig pu bgrod/ 
243a1(mdo sde): pa'i lam la reg byed shes rab las// zhi gnas lhag mthong dga' ba 'di ni shes rab rtsa// rig dang rnam par grol la reg 'di shes rab las// rnam thar gsum
243a2(mdo sde): la mngon par brtson pa shes rab rtsa// rigs gsum mngon du byed pa shes rab las shes bya// gal te dran pa nye bzhag sgom pa shes rab rtsa// lhun grub rdzu 'phrul thob pa 'di ni
243a3(mdo sde): shes rab rtsa// dran med yid la byed med de ni shes rab las// sdig pa spangs te dge ba spyod pa shes rab rtsa// chos 'di rang bzhin spangs pa de ni shes rab las// gal te rdzu
243a4(mdo sde): 'drul rkang pa bzhi sgom shes rab rtsa// lhun grub rngu 'phru/ la thob pa 'di ni shes rab las// dad pas mos na das yid ches pa ni shes rab rtsa// chags pa thams cad
243a5(mdo sde): gang bral de ni shes rab las// zhum med rtag tu brtson du de ni shes rab rtsa// lus dang yid sems rab sbyangs 'di ni shes rab las// dran dang shes bzhin mkhas pa
243a6(mdo sde): 'di ni shes rab rtsa// gnas rnams kun la mi gnas 'di ni shes rab las// rang gi ting 'dzin rtogs pa de ni shes rab rtsa// rang bzhin mnyam par bzhag la spyod pa 'di ni shes rab
243a7(mdo sde): las/ gal te shes rab dbang por rab gnas shes rab rtsa// 'gro ba'i dbang po thams cad shes pa shes rab las// stobs lnga po dag rjesu sgom pa shes rab rtsa// bcom
243a8(mdo sde): nas ye shes thob pa de ni shes rab las// byang chub yan lag rjes 'thun bzod pa shes rab rtsa// chos kun rjesu gang rtogs de ni shes rab las// lam gyi yan lag skye gnas grub
243b1(mdo sde): pa shes rab rtsa// chos dang chos min spong ba 'di ni shes rab las// sdug bsngal rang bzhin mkhas pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa// gal te 'gog pa mngon sum byed 'di shes rab las/ 
243b2(mdo sde): drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde tshig 'dzin shes rab rtsa// nges pa'i don la rton pa 'di ni shes rab las// thams cad thos pas mi ngoms 'di ni shes rab rtsa// don las rab tu rton pa 'di ni shes
243b3(mdo sde): rab las// rnam par shes pa tshul bzhin tshol la shes rab rtsa// ye shes la ni shes rab rton 'di shes rab las// gang zag gang la'ang ma zhe na de ni shes rab rtsa// gal te chos
243b4(mdo sde): nyid rton pa 'di ni shes rab las// 'du byed mi rtag yodangs su tshol ba shes rab rtsa// gal te bzod nas ma skyes shes rab las// 'du byed sdug bsngal mos par
243b5(mdo sde): byed pa shes rab rtsa// chos rnams 'dus ma byas su mos ba shes rab las// chos rnams bdag med the tshom med pa shes rab rtsa// sems can 'di dag gdod nas dag
243b6(mdo sde): de shes rab las// mya ngan 'das la zhi bar mos pa shes rab rtsa// 'gro ba shin tu mya ngan 'das 'di shes rab las// don gyi rjes su rtog pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa// don rtogs so so
243b7(mdo sde): yang dag rig pa shes rab las// gal te chos nyid mos par byed pa shes rab rtsa// chos la so so yang dag rig pa shes rab las// sgra rnams kun la skrag pa med 'di shes rab rtsa/ 
243b8(mdo sde): nges tshig so so yang dag rig 'di shes rab las// skrag med blo yi spobs pa de ni shes rab rtsa// spobs pa so so yang dag rig pa shes rab las// gal te sems can gnas pa'i byams
244a1(mdo sde): de shes rabs// dmigs pa med pa'i byams thob de ni shes rab las// bdag dang gzhan la snying rje 'di ni shes rab rtsa// gang gis gnyis ga
244a2(mdo sde): mi tog de ni shes rab las// mchog tu dga' la dga' batho ba 'di shes rapo d+ha// dga' med gdung ba med pa 'dzini shes rab las// byams dang gangon par mi byed don shes
244a3(mdo sde): rab rtsa// gnyis las sems grol thob pa 'di ni shes rab las// blo gros ldan pa sangs rgyas dran 'di shes rab rtsa// gang tshe chos sku rjes su rtogs pa shes rab las/ 
244a4(mdo sde): chos kyang rtag tu dran pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa// chos rnams 'dod chags brel bar rtogs pa shes rab la sa// yon tan las ni dge 'dun dran te shes rab tu
244a5(mdo sde): de yang 'dus ma byas su rtogs pa shes rab las/ blo ldan gtong ba dran de ni shes rab rtsa// gang phyir nyon mongs kun 'dor 'di ni shes rab las/ 
244a6(mdo sde): tshul khrims shin tu dag pa dran 'di shes rab rtsa// tshul khrims zag pa med la gnas ni shes rab las// che ba'i bdag nyid lha dran 'di ni shes rab rtsa// dag nas dag pa
244a7(mdo sde): dran pa 'di ni shes rab las// gang phyir bsgrims te thos pa tshol ba shes rab rtsa// gzhan dag las ni phyis mi tshol ba shes rab las// legs par byed pa'i las
244a8(mdo sde): byed 'di ni shes rab rtsa// las phyis mngon par 'du mi byed pa shes rab las// nga rgyal med cing 'dud par byed pa shes rab rtsa// ye shes che ba'i bdag nyid thob 'di shes rab
244b1(mdo sde): las/ bdag gi don la brtson 'gyur 'di ni shes rab rtsa// sems can rnams kyi don byed 'di ni shes rab las// gal te chos kyi phung po 'dzin byed shes rab rtsa// sems can
244b2(mdo sde): spyod pa rjesu rtogs byed shes rab las// gzhan gyi blo la yang dag thob byed shes rab rtsa// sems can theg gsum nges 'byung byed pa shes rab las// blo gros ldan pa sbyin
244b3(mdo sde): dang snyan par smra ba dang // don byed sems can yongs smin shes pa shes rab rtsa// gal te don 'thun pa yis sangs rgyas yon tan 'god// 'di ni skyes bu dam pa rnams
244b4(mdo sde): kyi shes rab las// srid pa kun tu 'bar shes skrag pa she das rab rtsa// mi skye bzod pa thob pa de ni shes rab ladas// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'di shes rab rtsa ba ste/ 
244b5(mdo sde): dbang bskur ba'i sa thob de ni shes rab las// gal te byang chub shing drung 'dug pa shes rab rtsa// kun mkhyen ye shes reg pa 'di ni shes rab las// byang
244b6(mdo sde): chub sems 'di shes rab rtsa ba zhes kyang bya// sems ni gnas su gang byed de ni shes rab las// gang dag byang chub sems la rtag gnas mi g.yo ba/ de dag shes
244b7(mdo sde): rab kyis ni rtag tu las bya byed// rtsa ba 'di 'dra byang chub spyod pa mchog gi sems// sangs rgyas stobs dang de bzhin so so yang dag rig/ de yi bsngags pa bskal pa/ 
244b8(mdo sde): bye ba mang brjod kyang // sangs rgyas yon tan tha mar thug par 'gyur ba med// gang dag 'das pa'i bde gshegs de bzhin da ltar byung // gang dag ma 'ongs pa dang phyogs bcu'i thub
245a1(mdo sde): dbang po// tshad med pa la bsnyen bkur tshad med byed 'dod gang // de ni ma mos byang chub sems la dga' ba yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
245a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' gzungs kyi dang phyug gi rgyal po 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kye mji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
245a3(mdo sde): 'di shin tu rnam par nges shing yi ga rnams kyis bstan pa mtha' yas bdon gyi 'jug pa mtha' yas pa// mi brtson pa rnams kyis 'jug par dka' ba// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
245a4(mdo sde): rjesu rtogs pas zab pa// gnyis pa spyod pa rnams kyis 'tshal ba dka' ba// skye mched drug la rten pa rnams kyis mthong bar dka' ba// theg pa dman pa
245a5(mdo sde): la mos pa rnams kyis yid ches par dka' ba// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma lags pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
245a6(mdo sde): spyod yul chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid pas che ba ma mchis pa// nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi slad du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa// shin tu 'das pas kun
245a7(mdo sde): gzhi ma mchis pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rab tu shes pa// rgyu thams cad yongasu shes pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba nges par 'byung ba rnams
245a8(mdo sde): kyis 'byung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis thabs so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa rnams kyis rnam par dbye bar bgyi ba/ mngon par shes pa thob pa rnams kyis rnam par dgrol
245b1(mdo sde): pabar bgyi ba/ tshul gcig la gnas pa rnams kyis mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bgyi ba/ sna tshogs ma mchis par spyod pa rnams la khyad par ma mchis pa
245b2(mdo sde): namapa' dang mnyam pa/ gnyen po ma mchis pas mnyam pa nyid pas mi mnyam pa ma mchis pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid pas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ 
245b3(mdo sde): 'gog pas rab tu phye bas gnyis dang bral ba/ yi ge rnams kyis dpyad du ma mchis pa// don gyis yang dag par bzhag pa/ sgras rnam par rigs par bgyi ba
245b4(mdo sde): don dam par brjod du ma mchis pa/ kun rdzob du ba rjod du ma mchis pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi ma thu dang ldan pa/ theg pa gsum la rnam par rtog pa/ 
245b5(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag rab tu ston pa/ khams gsum pa las shin tu 'das pa/ rigapa gsum po dag khong du chud par bgyid pa rdorje
245b6(mdo sde): lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin skyed pa/ chos thams cad kyi gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes las byung ba/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'chog sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsal bar mdzad pa ni
245b7(mdo sde): mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub bstan pa tshad ma mchis pa 'di la mos par bgyid pa dang / bla na
245b8(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang sems bskyed par bgyid pa dang / dam pa'i yongs su bzung ba'i slad du mdo sde 'di nyan par bgyid pa dang / mos par bgyid pa dang
246a1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgying ba dang / gzhan dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par ston par bgyid pa
246a2(mdo sde): de dag bcom ldan 'das bsod nams mang du skyed pa lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang byas pa bzo ba dang / byas pa 'tshal ba lags so// bcom
246a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ de dag bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang
246a4(mdo sde): gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sangs nga rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
246a5(mdo sde): sbyin pa byin pa bas/ gang gis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di nyan tam/ 
246a6(mdo sde): mos sam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ ston tam/ gzhan dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par ston tam
246a7(mdo sde): bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par gnas na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams mang du skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 
246a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas spyan gyi zhing gang ngas mthong ba// rin chen bkang ste de bzhin gshegs byin yang // 'di lta bu yi chos 'di ma thos na// de ni bsod nams chung zhes nga smra'o// 
246b1(mdo sde): gang gis dam pa'i don ldan phra zab pa// mdo sde bzang po 'di ni thos gyur nas// kun tu 'dzin cing bzung nas klog byed pa// 'di ni de bas bsod nams mchog tu 'phag/ 
246b2(mdo sde): 'di ltar rgyal ba'i chos kyi nyer gnas shing // chos kyis nges par 'byung gi zang zing min// de bas gang zhig bde gshegs chos 'dzin pa// de ni sangs rgyas kun
246b3(mdo sde): la byas pa bzo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag khyed kyi nang nas nga yongs su mya ngan
246b4(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i phyin/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnus par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
246b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi byang chub 'di yongs su bsrung bar su smra/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cus mgrin gcig
246b6(mdo sde): tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis par bsgrubs pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / slad ma'i
246b7(mdo sde): tshe slad ma'i dus de na yang rgyas par bgyid par spro'o// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang ci nas de'i dus na skye bo mang po gnas par 'gyur ba// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i
246b8(mdo sde): sems can de dag gi rnam par grag par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ngo'i tshe tshig
247a1(mdo sde): su bcang pa 'di dag pa 'a stsal to// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pade ba gsungs// bden pa'i chos la rab tu gnas// byin gyis rlabs kyis dengs
247a2(mdo sde): la/ mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// snying rje chen po'i go ca bgos// byams pa de dag rab tu gnas// kun la byams pa nyid kyi phyir// mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis
247a3(mdo sde): brlabs// bsod nams tshogs ni phun sum tshogs// ye shes tshogs kyis byung gyur pa// tshogs rnams kun dang ldan pa yis// mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis
247a4(mdo sde): brlabs// bdud rnams thams cad nges 'jom la// smra ba thams cad rab 'dul zhing // lta ba tham sa cad rgyun gcod pa// mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis
247a5(mdo sde): brlabs// 'jig rten skyong dang brgya byin dang / de/ bzhin lha ma yin rnams dang // lha dang dri za klu dag dang // ngas ni byin gyis brlabs par byas// sa
247a6(mdo sde): dang de bzhin par snang la// lha rnam sa mang po gang 'khod pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin rlabs kyis// tshul 'di rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur// 'di bsrung bar bya
247a7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir// tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams ldan zhing // bden pa bzhi pos brgyan gyur pa// mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// namamakha' gzugs can byed kyang sring // 
247a8(mdo sde): gzugs ni gzugs med byed srid kyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin rlabs ni// rnam par dkrugs par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po dag gis mgrin
247b1(mdo sde): gcig tu tshigs su bcang pa 'di gnyis gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag rnams// mdo 'di kun tu bsrung slad du// rtsalag dang ni bcas rnams kyi// bsrung / 
247b2(mdo sde): bzang po bgyi bar 'tshal// mkhas pa byang chub blo gros bgyis// gang dag 'dzin par bgyid pa dag/ de dag la ni phyogs bzhi nas// rtag par kun tu bsrung
247b3(mdo sde): b.rabagyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshigs su bcang ba 'di gnyis gsol to// bdag ni bcom ldan mdzad pa gtso/ 
247b4(mdo sde): 'dren pa chos kyi dbang bdag lags// mgon po mdo/ sde mchog 'di las sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab tu bsta/ na// sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi// mdzadapa
247b5(mdo sde): gzab bsrung bgyid cing // 'di 'dra'i mdo dang bzhin du// mang sde 'dzin pa bsrung bar 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi mjed kyi bdag poms
247b6(mdo sde): bas tshigs su bcang ba 'di gnyis gsol to// bsam gtan gang dang cheng med dang // theg pa kun gyis 'byung ba gang // de dag dor ldan zab
247b7(mdo sde): mo si// mang sde 'di 'angs la lha'i bu rab dga' ldan gyis tshigs su bcang ba 'di gnyis gsol to// gang zhig sangs rgyas gsungs pa yi// mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin 'gyur ba// 
247b8(mdo sde): skye ba gcig gis rapa gnas nas// dga' ldan rnams su gnas par 'gyur// mgon po bdag ni lha yul ba'i// bur su mtshogs pabor nas su// tshul 'a sa tu/ 
247b9(mdo sde): te//  di // gzhan pa'i sa da zhin du// srung ba'i slad du sa // de nas bam ldan
248a1(mdo sde): ston bgyid cing // 'dzam bu gling du gnas par spro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud kyi buded dpon gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// 
248a2(mdo sde): gang zhig don dang ldan pa yi// mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin 'gyur ba// de dag bdud las 'di spangs pas// bdud kyi dbang du mi mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag kyang ni/ 
248a3(mdo sde): mdo 'di kun tu bsrung slad du// ci nas kyang ni rgyas 'gyur bar// brtson par bgyid cing 'dun par bgyid// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad
248a4(mdo sde): pa 'di gnyis gsol to// rnam par 'dren pa gang zhi// ga ni nyon mongs thams cad tshar gcod pa// 'di 'dzin bgyid pa de dag la// bdag ni sgrib par mi bgyid/ 
248a5(mdo sde): do/ mdo sde mchog ni 'byung ba der// bdud kyi go skab sa ma mchis so// mgon pos gsungs pa dran bgyi pa// de la bsrung ba bgyid par 'tshal// de
248a6(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu mtshams rab kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub ni// mdo sde 'di las rab bshad pas// gang zhig
248a7(mdo sde): mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa// des ni sangs rgyas kun la mchod// mgon po bdag ni mdo sde 'di// lha ni bye ba rnams la bshad// gang dag gus par nyan pa dag/ byang chub yang dag 'dzin du/ 
248a8(mdo sde): stsal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// mi gang byang chub rab zhugs ste// dam chos yongs su bsrung bslad du/ 
248b1(mdo sde): bdag kyang gtong bgyid de dag ni// gsol ba ma btab bshes gnyen lags// bdag ni dga' ldan mchis nas su// sangs rgyas kyi na byin rlabs kyis// 'di lta bu'i mdo sde
248b2(mdo sde): 'di shin tu rgyas par bgyi bar 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshigasu bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// ston pa las ni bdag gis su/ 
248b3(mdo sde): mdo sde stong phrag mang thos kyang // bdag gi mdo sde 'di lta bu// sngon chad nam yang mthos so// mngon sum du ni mdo sde 'di// blangs shing kun tu gzung lags te// byang
248b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i ched du ni// shin tu rgyas par bgyi bar 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de
248b5(mdo sde): ngag dang / lha'i bu de dag dang / byang chub sems/ dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag la le gas so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ skyes bu dam pa dag khyed
248b6(mdo sde): kyis dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba'i phyir/ 'di lta bu'i song ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legaso legs so// skyes bu dam pa dag khyed la bsgo'o// khyed kyis khong du chud par bya'o// 
248b7(mdo sde): sems can gang dag theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/ bzod pa ma thob pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun tu bzung ste/ bzung
248b8(mdo sde): nas kyang kun chub par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ma thob kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro// gang dag
249a1(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi theg pa par 'gyur ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan thos 'dus pa dang po'i grangs su chung bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gang
249a2(mdo sde): dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag ni nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gzhan las ma thos par rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi/ 
249a3(mdo sde): rgyal pos yongs su zhus pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grang 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa na/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa'
249a4(mdo sde): grangs med pa dag ni phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag ni rnam pa dru dag tu g.yos so// snang ba chen pos kyang gsal bar gyur
249a5(mdo sde): to// me tog sil mas kyang gtor bar gyur to// phyog sa bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang
249a6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi rnam par bkra bar byas ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched
249a7(mdo sde): du brjod do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rnyed par bgyi ba legs par rnyed do// gang gi slad du bdag cag gis rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu thos pas bdag
249a8(mdo sde): cag 'dir mchis pa lags so// kye ma bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe yongasu bskyang du gsol// 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par
249b1(mdo sde): gyur cig/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag kyang dus ring por yun ring du tshe yongs su skyong bar gyur cig
249b2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la yang phan pa byed par gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad gsol to// kye ma bcom
249b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji tsam du rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni don bzang ba dang / tshig 'bru bzang ba dang / legs par brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchog tu dga'
249b4(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / bdud dang pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'jom pa dang / chos thams cad la mkhas pa 'dzin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par bgyid
249b5(mdo sde): pa dang / theg pa thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba'i phyir/ 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams/ cad kyi yon tan la 'jug pa'i rjesu song ba dang / thams
249b6(mdo sde): cad kyis brtson par bgyi ba la gti mug ma mchis par ston pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mang ci lags/ 'di ji skad gzung bar bgyi// de skad ces
249b7(mdo sde): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod kyis chos
249b8(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i las don yod pa nyan pa lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig
250a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis ngend ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gardzas kyi dang byug gi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems da pa'i tshogs dang / 
250a2(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi tshogs de thams cad dang / sna nga / mi dang / lha ma yin dang/ dri zang bcas pa'i 'jig na yid ngas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par/ 
250a3(mdo sde): bstong ngo // 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi
250a4(mdo sde): mkhan po shi len dra bo d+hi dang zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad dkyis kyang bcos nas gtan la bab pa/ 
250a5(mdo sde): rgya ga ga / t+ye ni shwa ra nA ma ma hA yAn swAt+ma/ gang du/ 'dags pa bzhi pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba theg
250a6(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
250a7(mdo sde): 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems
250a8(mdo sde): dpa' brgya stong thams cad kyang go cha chen po bgos pa sha stag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
250b1(mdo sde): 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po
250b2(mdo sde): che'i gdugs dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu 'dzin to// de nas 'khor de nyid du dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan zhes
250b3(mdo sde): bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa g.yog dang bcas te 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas// 'dug pa de stan las langs te/ gos
250b4(mdo sde): phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'ilhang sa la gtsugs te/ 'jam dab dal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
250b5(mdo sde): btung nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di/ skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod da dung de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las mdzad pas ma
250b6(mdo sde): tshim mam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rgya mtsho chen po chu thams cad len pas gzhar yang chog shes sam lha'i bus smras
250b7(mdo sde): pa 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po mtsho gting dpag dka' ba de lta bu'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
250b8(mdo sde): tshad med/ dpag tu med pa btsal bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyis gzhar yang tshim par mi bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa
251a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ci la dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
251a2(mdo sde): dmigs pa bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu bkrol ba la
251a3(mdo sde): dmigs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu bzung ba la dmigs pa ste/ lha'i bu byang chub
251a4(mdo sde): sems dpa'as dmigs pa bzhi po de dag gis de bzhin gshe gas pa la mchod par bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha'i nang du tshangs pa
251a5(mdo sde): gtsug pud can la byang chub sems dpa'i lam bzhi pa bsgru ba pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pa de/ 'jam dpal legs par bshad du gsol/ de la ni
251a6(mdo sde): bdag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di yang nyan par 'tshal lo// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ chos kyi ser sna ma mchis slob dpon gyi chos kyi dpe mkhyud kyang ma
251a7(mdo sde): mchis/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / bzhi pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de ngas khyod la bshad do// 
251a8(mdo sde): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems bskyed par rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na lha'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dpag tu med pa bsdu
251b1(mdo sde): ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa dang / sems can dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bstsags pa'i phyir sems skyed pa dang
251b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sems skyed pa ste/ lha'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems bskyed par
251b3(mdo sde): rig par bya'o// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa brag lta bu yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ slong ba rnams la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / 
251b4(mdo sde): log par zhugs pa rnams la snying rje ba'i sems dang / shes rab las ma nyams pa'i sems dang / rtsom pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i sems te
251b5(mdo sde): lnga'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi se mas bskyed pa brag lta bu yin no// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
251b6(mdo sde): bskyed pa mngon par 'phags pa yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims mngon par 'phags pa dang / thos pa mngon par 'phags pa dang / byams pa chen po mngon par
251b7(mdo sde): 'phags pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon par 'phags pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa brtan pa
251b8(mdo sde): snying po can mi byed pa rdo rje lta bu'o// bzhi ga zhe na/ bsam pa las mi byed pa dang / mdza' ba las mi byed pa dang / nan tan las mi byed pa dang / theg pa chen po las mi byed pa / 
252a1(mdo sde): bzhi po dag go/ lha'i drub ni po 'de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa brten pa' ba yin no// bzhig shen/ nyon mos pa
252a2(mdo sde): dam lus pa dang / smye ba nga ku nga / tshogs su bcang pa thams cadang ma dres padang / rdeg bduman pad ma su pa dang /  bzlas pathams
252a3(mdo sde): ma'adres pa ste/ bzhi pa de dgag/ spyi'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa blan med pa'o// bzhi gang nen/ bangs pa'i sa bo thams dang
252a4(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba'i sems dang byin nas 'gyod pa med pa'i sems dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i sems dang / byang chub tu yongs su sngo nga'i sems te
252a5(mdo sde): bzhi pa de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chubab sems dpa' rnams kyi spyi bor phyin pa'i chos so// bzhi gang zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
252a6(mdo sde): thabs la mkhas pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa/ 
252a7(mdo sde): kyi byang chub kyi la ma rtog par byed pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyi rjes su 'thun pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas
252a8(mdo sde): bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos gya nom pa dam pa mchog yin no// 
252b1(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa dang / gang dag de dang 'gal bar byed pa de dag nyid rab tu thar par bya bar sems bskyed pa dang / ji tsam gyi yul rgya chen
252b2(mdo sde): po zhig 'byor kyang de la bag yod pa dang / ji tsam du dbul bas phongs par gyur kyang chos spyod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
252b3(mdo sde): mos pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ khyim par gyur na bdag gi longs spyod kyis chog shes pa dang / gzhan gyi nor la mngon par 'dod pa med pa dang / rab tu byung na 'phags pa'i rigs kyi
252b4(mdo sde): chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin
252b5(mdo sde): pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ chos sbyin pa dang / zang zing sbyin pa dang / shog shog dang / snag tshwa dang / smyig gu dang / glegs bam sbyin pa dang
252b6(mdo sde): chos smra ba la bsam pa thag pa nas legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpan gyi snying po nyid do// bzhi gang zhe na/ thos
252b7(mdo sde): pa las nan tan snying po nyid dang / longs spyod pa rnams las gtong ba'i snying po nyid dang / lus las bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i snying po nyid dang / srog las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i snying po
252b8(mdo sde): nyid de/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongasu gtang bar mi bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems yongasu gtang bar mi bya ba dang
253a1(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yong su gtang bar mi bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yong su gtang bar mi bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad yongasu btsal ba yongs su
253a2(mdo sde): btang bar mi bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal lo// bzhi gang zhe na/ dgon pa la gnas pa dang / dben pa la
253a3(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ba dang / dge ba'i chos la bdun pa dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can yongasu smin par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sem
253a4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi gzhal med khang ngo // bzhi gang zhe na/ tshangs pa'i gnas dang / 'phel ba'i gtam gyis chos nyan pa la dga' ba myong bar byed pa dang / stong
253a5(mdo sde): pa nyid la nges par sems pa dang / skye bo rigs 'thun pa dang 'du ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor mi zad pa'o// 
253a6(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ blo nga'i nor dag tshe ston pa'i nor dang / sems can dngul po sdung ba'i nor dang / byang chub tu yongasu sngo ba'i nor te/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni
253a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ gzungs kyi gter dang / spabs pa'i gter dang / chos kyi gter dang / longs spyod zad mi shes par yongasu snga
253a8(mdo sde): bo'i gtor te/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du 'dzi las 'byung ba dang / yul
253b1(mdo sde): thams cad las 'byung ba dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i bsam pa las 'byung ba dang / khams gsum thams cad las 'byung ba ste/ bzhi po de dag ni mngon par 'byung ba'o// 
253b2(mdo sde): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bde ba'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba'i phyir bdag gi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa
253b3(mdo sde): med pa'i bde ba dang / yul spangs pas dben pa'i bde ba dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir zhi ba'i bde ba dang / sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba'i phyir mya ngan
253b4(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i bde ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/  lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu dga' ba'o// bzhi gang zhe na
253b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas mchog tu dga' ba dang / chos thos pas/ mchog tu dga' ba dang / sbyin pa la 'gyod pa med pas mchog tu
253b6(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad la bde ba skyed pas mchog tu dga' ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden
253b7(mdo sde): pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / yid ma las mi nyams pa dang / skyabasu song ba dag yongasu mi gtong ba dang / ngag bsdams pas
253b8(mdo sde): tshig thams cad bden pa ste/ bzhi pa de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i chos so// bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i chos thams cad la
254a1(mdo sde): lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyor ba dang / ma sgrubs pa thams cad la mi brnyas pa dang / gsol bam btab par sems can thams cad la bshes gnyen du gyur pa dang / na/ 
254a2(mdo sde): tan thams cad bsgrub pa la phyir bya ba'i re ba med pas lan la mi re ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa rnam par dag pa'o// 
254a3(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag med pa'i phyir tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / sems can med pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa dang / srog med pa'i phyir shes rab rnam par dag pa
254a4(mdo sde): dang / gang zag med pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba rnam par dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkang pa'o// bzhi gang zhe
254a5(mdo sde): na/ chos kyi rkang pa dang / don gyi rkang pa dang / sbyang sa pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pas 'jugapa'i rkang pa dang / byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs sogs
254a6(mdo sde): ba'i rkang pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lag pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ dang ba'i lag pa dang / tshul khrims kyi lag pa dang
254a7(mdo sde): thos pa'i lag pa dang / shes rab kyi lag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig go// bzhi gang zhe na/ las legs par byas
254a8(mdo sde): pa'i phyir sha'i mig dang / mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa'i phyir lha'i mig dang / shin tu thos pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir shes rab kyi mig dang / chos thams cad las nges pa
254b1(mdo sde): sems pa'i phyir chos kyi mig ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi ngoms pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pas mi ngoms pa dang / dgon
254b2(mdo sde): pa la gnas pas mi ngoms pa dang / chos nyan pas mi ngoms pa dang / dge ba'i chos kyi tshogs thams cad kyis mi ngoms pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni
254b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dka' ba byed pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing dang du blang ba dka' ba byed pa dang / dbul po la bdog pa thams cad
254b4(mdo sde): yongasu gtang bar bsam pa dka' ba byed pa dang / yan la ngag gi mchog mgo slong ba la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dka' ba byed kyi steng du/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen du
254b5(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa dang / skye ba mi rtog pas bsams bzhi na du skye bar byed pa'i dka' ba byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
254b6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi nad med pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ khams mnyam pas nad med pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba med pas nad med pa dang / sems can thams cad bde bar mnyam par
254b7(mdo sde): gzhog pas nad med pa dang / chos thams cad la the tsom med pas nad med pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdag gi phyogs so// 
254b8(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi phyogs dang / dge ba'i bshes banyen yang dag pa'i phyogs dang / sdig pa thams cad mi bya ba'i phyogs
255a1(mdo sde): te/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi skyong ba'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi bskyod pa dang
255a2(mdo sde): yi dam mi bskyod pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa las mi bskyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i nan tan las mi bskyod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
255a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs so// bzhi gang zhe na/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs dang / lhag mthong gi tshogs dang / thos pa'i tshogs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi tshogs te/ 
255a4(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos zung du 'brel bar 'gyur ba/ da'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ bsams pa dang sbyor ba zung du
255a5(mdo sde): 'brel ba dang / gtong ba dang sngo bzung du 'brel pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje zung du 'brel ba dang / thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba ste/ bzhi po de dag
255a6(mdo sde): go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ khron pa rdul can mthong zhing de'i gting na yang zla ba'i dkyil
255a7(mdo sde): 'khor mthong ba dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu 'am/ khron pa rnyog pa can mthong zhing de'i gting na yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / bar snang la sprin chen pos yog cing de la
255a8(mdo sde): yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / bar snang la rlung dang rdul dang du bas 'khrigs par mthong zhing de la yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'didag
255b1(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ g.yang sa chen po nas bdag g.yang du lhung bar mthong ba dang / lam mtho dman can du
255b2(mdo sde): mthong ba dang / bdag lam srang dog par zhugs par mthong ba dang / rmi lam na phyogs bslad cing 'jigs pa mang po mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang
255b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ dug drag pos 'khrugs par mthong ba dang / gcan zan gtum po phal po che'i sku
255b4(mdo sde): thos pa dang / bdag g.yon can gyi nang na gnas par mthong ba dang / bdag gi lus dri ma can dang / gos dri ma can du mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ 
255b5(mdo sde): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs 'thob pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ gter chen po rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang
255b6(mdo sde): ba mthong ba dang / rdzing bu me tog pad+ma rgyas pas yongasu gang ba mthong ba dang / bdag gos dkar po'i phrugs rnyed par mthong ba dang / lha zhig spyi ba'i gtsug na gdugs 'dzin par mthong ba ste/ 
255b7(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ bu mo bzang mo rgyan bzang pos brgyan pa
255b8(mdo sde): me tog sil ma 'bul bar mthong ba dang / na mkha' la bya ngang ba dkar po thal kar gyi khyu skad 'byin cing 'gro bar mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mang po brgyan pa'i phyag spyi bor
256a1(mdo sde): 'jog par mthong ba dngade bzhin gshegs pa me tog pad ma la bzhugs shing bsam gtan mdzad par mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi
256a2(mdo sde): po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char bar mthong ba dang / nyi ma'i
256a3(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor 'char bar mthong ba dang / me tog pad ma kha 'bus par mthong ba dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rab tu zhi ba'i spyod lam mthong ba ste/ lha'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub
256a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i da rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag da ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rgyu
256a5(mdo sde): 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ shings la chen po'i 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis gang bar mthong ba dang / khar ba'i snang
256a6(mdo sde): gser gyis gang bar mthong ba dang / nam pa'i ngos gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan gyis gang bar mthong ba dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po mthong ba ste/ 
256a7(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud 'dul ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ gyang chen pos gyang thams cad mnan nas/ ba dan thog
256a8(mdo sde): te 'gro bar mthong ba dang / dpa' bo chen po g.yul nas 'das te 'gro ba mthong ba dang / rgyal po dbang bskur bar mthong ba dang / bdag nyid byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing bdud 'dul bar mthong ba
256b1(mdo sde): ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags kyi rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ mgo la thod dkar ngos
256b2(mdo sde): bcings par mthong ba dang / bdag gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed par mthong ba dang / bdag chos kyi stan chen po la 'dug par mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying
256b3(mdo sde): po la bzhugs shing chos ston par mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po thob pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo// 
256b4(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ bum pa mthong ba dang / bya tsa shas bskor bar mthong ba dang / gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du shing thams cad dang ldan zhing 'dud la phyag 'tshal
256b5(mdo sde): bar byed pa dang / gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba chen po mthong ba ste/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po mthong ba'i rgyu 'thun
256b6(mdo sde): pa'i rmi lam mo// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan dga' mgu yid rangs te/ rab tu dga'
256b7(mdo sde): zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ 'khor dang bcas pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog man nga ra ba dag dang
256b8(mdo sde): ul ba la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gtor ro// me tog de dag gtor ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sangs
257a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la me tog pad ma shing rta'i phang lo tsam gyi tshad lta sdug pa/ gsung dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba dag byung bar gyur to// me tog de dag gi
257a2(mdo sde): dbus kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa'i lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa dag byung bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ lha'i bu dpal
